T08suvrnavu:4: [1] evam anuśrūyate sthavira mahākāśyape parinirvṛte sthavirānando mahātmā śāradvatīputrasamanuprajñayā
T08suvrnavu:5: samanvāgatas tathāgata iva kāruṇyāt teṣu teṣu grāmanagaranigamapallīpattanādiṣu tāṃs
T08suvrnavu:6: tān vaineyāṃs tais tair upāyaviśeṣair vinayati sma /
T08suvrnavu:7: yāvad apareṇa samayena vineyavaśād anekāni sattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahastrāṇi saddharmmadeśanāmṛtavarṣābhiṣekeṇa santarpayan vaiśālyām viharaty āmrapālīvane /
T08suvrnavu:9: [2] tena khalu punaḥ samayena rājagṛhe nagare divākaro nāma sārthavāhaḥ prativasaty
T08suvrnavu:10: āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratisparddhī /
T08suvrnavu:12: sa tayā sārddha krīḍati ramate paricārayati sma /
T08suvrnavu:13: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato na putro na duhitā /
T08suvrnavu:15: deveṣu trayastriṃśeṣv anyatamasya puṇyamaheśākhyasya devaputrasya pañcapūrvanimittāni prādurbhūtāni /
T08suvrnavu:16: sa buddhotpādavibhūṣitaṃ lokam avalokya nirvāṇābhilāṣīcchati manuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdhiṃ grahītum /
T08suvrnavu:18: [3] adrākṣīc chakro devendras taṃ devaputraṃ cyavanadharmmāṇaṃ buddhotpādavibhūṣitaṃ
T08suvrnavu:19: lokam avalokya nirvāṇābhilāṣī icchati manuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdhiṃ grahītum iti dṛṣṭvā
T08suvrnavu:21: sa cet tvaṃ mārṣa icchasi manuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdhiṃ grahītum /
T08suvrnavu:22: rājagṛhe nagare divākarasya sārthavāhasya patnyāḥ kukṣau pratisaṃdhiṃ gṛhāṇeti /
T08suvrnavu:23: sa kathayati kauśikaṃ aśrāddho 'sau sārthavāhas tasya buddhe prasādo nāstīti /
T08suvrnavu:25: mārṣa gṛhāṇa tvaṃ ahan tathā kariṣyāmi yathāsau sārthavāho buddhaśāsane 'bhiprasīdatīti /
T08suvrnavu:27: kauśika sa ced asau sārthavāhaḥ sapatnīko yāvajjīvaṃ ratnatrayaṃ śaraṇaṅ gacched evam ahaṃ tasya sārthavāhasya patnyāḥ kukṣau pratisandhiṃ grahīṣyāmīti
T08suvrnavu:29: [4] tataḥ śakro devendro devebhyas trayastriṃśebhya antarīkṣe rājagṛhe nagare divākarasya sārthavāhasya gṛhe uparime talake pratyasthāt /
T08suvrnavu:30: śakrasya devendrasya varṇānubhāvena sarvatra gṛhaṃ divyenāvabhāsenāvabhāsitam adrākṣīd
T08suvrnavu:31: divākaraḥ sārthavāhas tu divyam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punar vismayotphullalocanaś caturdiśam
T08suvrnavu:32: avalokayitum ārabdhaḥ yāvat paśyati śakraṃ devendraṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ sahasaiva tasya
T08suvrnavu:33: padayor praṇipatyovāca devendra lābhā me sulabdhā me tvaṃ gṛham āyātaḥ pavitrīkṛtañ
T08suvrnavu:37: sārthavāha tvam aputraḥ putrābhinandī tad adyāgreṇa sapatnīko yāvajjīvaṃ ratnatrayaṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccha /
T08suvrnavu:40: devendra yathā tvam ājñāpayasi tathā karomy eṣo 'ham adyāgreṇa sapatnīko jāvajjīvaṃ
T08suvrnavu:41: ratnatrayaṃ śaraṇaṅ gacchāmīty atha śakro devendro divākaraṃ sārthavāhaṃ sapatnīkaṃ
T08suvrnavu:42: śaraṇagamane pratiṣṭhāpya rājagṛhād antarhito deveṣu trayastriṃśeṣv pratyaṣṭāt /
T08suvrnavu:43: tasya devaputrasya bhavane tataḥ śakro devendras tasya devaputrasyaitat prakaraṇaṃ vistareṇākhyātavān /
T08suvrnavu:45: [5] yāvad asau devaputro devebhyas trayastriṃśebhyaś cyuto rājagṛhe nagare divākarasya sārthavāhasya patnyāḥ kukṣim avakrāntaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:46: sa yata eva tasyāḥ kukṣim avakrāntas tata eva tasyāḥ sārthavāhapatnyāḥ śarīre parā varṇapuṣkalatā prādurbhūtā /
T08suvrnavu:58: sa ced dārako bhavati dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśṛtya tiṣṭhati /
T08suvrnavu:64: yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati niyataṃ dārako bhaviṣyatīti /
T08suvrnavu:65: śrutvā ca punaḥ so 'py āttamanātamanāḥ pūrvakāyam abhyunnamayya dakṣiṇam bāhum abhiprasāryodānam udānayati /
T08suvrnavu:66: apy evāhaṃ cirakālābhilaṣitaṃ putramukhaṃ paśyeyaṃ jāto me syān nāvajātaḥ kṛtyāni me kurvvīta bhṛtaḥ pratibibhṛyād dāyādyaṃ pratipadyet /
T08suvrnavu:67: kulavaṃśo me cirasthitikaḥ syād asmākañ cātyatītakālagatānām alpaṃ vā prabhūtam vā dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā asmākañ ca nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādekṣyate
T08suvrnavu:68: idaṃ tayor yatra tatropapannayor gacchator anugacchatv iti
T08suvrnavu:70: [6] āpannasattvāñ caināṃ viditvā upariprāsādatalagatām ayantritāṃ dhārayati /
T08suvrnavu:71: śīte śītopakaraṇai uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇair vaidyaprajñaptair āhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair
T08suvrnavu:73: āhārair hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātrtrīm apsarasam iva nandanavanavicāriṇīṃ mañcān mañcaṃ
T08suvrnavu:75: na cāsyāḥ kiñcid amanojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvad eva garbhasya paripākāya /
T08suvrnavu:76: sā aṣṭānām vā navānām vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
T08suvrnavu:78: uttaptasuvarṇavarṇayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ sarvajanamanonayanaharaḥ suvarṇapītair vastrair avaguṇṭhitavigrahaḥ sarvaśarīrāc cāsya candanagandho vāti /
T08suvrnavu:80: tasya jātamātrasya tasmin gṛhe vastravarṣaṃ karṇikārakusumavarṣañ ca patitam /
T08suvrnavu:83: [7] tatas tām atyadbhutāṃ tasya ca rūpaudāryasampadāṃ dṛṣṭvā divākarasya sārthavāhasya patnī parijanaś ca param vismayam āpannaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:84: divākaraś ca sārthavāho gṛhasya bahir dvārakoṣṭhake sthitaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:85: tasya niveditaṃ sārthavāho diṣṭyā varddhase putras tu jāta iti /
T08suvrnavu:86: sa hṛṣṭatuṣṭodagramanā gṛhaṃ praviṣṭo yāvat paśyati kumāram atyantam abhirūpaṃ darśanīyaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:88: uttaptasuvarṇavarṇayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgataṃ sarvajanamanonayanaharaṃ suvarṇapītair vastrair avaguṇṭhitavigrahaṃ kāyāc cāsya candanagandho vāti mukhāc ca nīlotpalagandhaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:90: tāni ca vastrāṇi suvarṇavarṇāni dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ paramaprītiprāmodya udānam udānayati
T08suvrnavu:91: aho lābhā me sulabdhāḥ aho paripūṇo me manoratho yasya me īdṛśaḥ puṇyamaheśākhyaḥ putro jāta iti /
T08suvrnavu:94: [8] tasya ca kumārasya trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃśati divasān vistareṇa jātamātrasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
T08suvrnavu:96: jñātaya ucur ayaṃ kumāra uttaptasuvarṇavarṇayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ /
T08suvrnavu:97: tasmād bhavatu kumārasya suvarṇavarṇa iti nāma suvarṇavarṇa iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāro 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo 'nupradattaḥ
T08suvrnavu:98: dvābhyām aṅkadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ
T08suvrnavu:99: krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyāṃ yāvad āśu varddhate hradastham iva paṅkajam sa yadā mahān
T08suvrnavu:100: saṃvṛttaḥ tadā lipyām upanyastaḥ saṃkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāṃ uddhāre nyāse nikṣepe
T08suvrnavu:101: vastuparīkṣāyāṃ vastraparīkṣāyāṃ vastraparīkṣāyāṃ ibhiparīkṣāyāṃ aśvaparīkṣāyāṃ dāruparīkṣāyāṃ
T08suvrnavu:102: ratnaparīkṣāyāṃ kumāraparīkṣāyāṃ kumārikāparīkṣāyāṃ so 'ṣṭāsu parīkṣāsūdghāṭako vācakaḥ
T08suvrnavu:104: sa ca śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ ātmahitaparahitaṃ pratipannaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:105: kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmmakāmaḥ satvatsalas tena ca śāstrāṇy adhītāni /
T08suvrnavu:108: vastrādikan dhanaṃ sarvan tat tathaiva sampadyate /
T08suvrnavu:109: kin tu na vijānāty aham eva puṇyamaheśākhya iti /
T08suvrnavu:110: divākaraś ca sārthavāho ratnatrayaśaraṇagamanaprabhāvān me putro jāta iti bhūyasyā mātrayā bhagavac chāsane 'bhiprasannaḥ sa kālena kālaṃ bhagavacchāsane kārāṅ karoti sma /
T08suvrnavu:112: [9] tena khalu samayena rājagṛhe nagare vimalo nāma sārthavāho mahāsamudrāt saṃsiddhayānapātro
T08suvrnavu:113: 'bhyāgatas tenārddhatrayodaśaparivāraṃ buddham bhagavantaṃ bhojayitvā ekaiko bhikṣus
T08suvrnavu:114: tricīvareṇācchāditas tasya yaśasā sarvo loka āpūrṇaḥ sārthasya saphalaṃ mahāsamudrāvataraṇaṃ
T08suvrnavu:115: sārthavāhaśabdaś ca yenaivaṃ bhagavacchāsane kārāḥ kṛtā iti /
T08suvrnavu:119: yāvantaḥ ke cana bhagavacchrāvakā jambūdvīpe prativasanti bhagavantaṃ vijñapya tān
T08suvrnavu:120: aikadhya sannipātya praṇītenāhāreṇa santarpya ekaikaṃ bhikṣuṃ mahārheṇa tricīvareṇācchādayiṣyāmīti /
T08suvrnavu:122: sā kathayati svāmin ṛdhyantu tava saṅkalpāḥ /
T08suvrnavu:124: tato divākaraḥ sārthavāho rājagṛhe nagare yāvat trir api ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṅ kārayitvā
T08suvrnavu:125: pañcavaṇikaśataparivāro mahāsamudram avatīrṇas tasya tasmin mahāsamudre 'vatīrṇasya
T08suvrnavu:126: bhagavān parinirvṛtas tatra sthitasyaiva cāsya sthaviramahākāśyapo 'pi parinirvṛto
T08suvrnavu:128: [10] yāvad apareṇa samayena suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāro veṇuvanaṅ gatas tatra bhikṣur anityatāpratisaṃyuktā gāthā svādhyāyati sma /
T08suvrnavu:129: āyur divā ca rātrau ca carato vā sthitasya vā /
T08suvrnavu:130: sroto mahānadīnām vā yāty eva na nivartate /1/
T08suvrnavu:132: alpodake ca matsyānāṃ kā nu teṣāṃ rati bhavet /2/
T08suvrnavu:135: na cirād vata kāyo 'yaṃ pṛthivīm adhiśeṣyate /
T08suvrnavu:136: śūnyo vyapeta vijñāno nirastaṃ vā kaḍaṅgaraṃ /4/
T08suvrnavu:140: mīmita paramāṃ śāntiṃ yogakṣemam anuttaram iti /6/
T08suvrnavu:142: [11] athaitā gāthāḥ śrutvā suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāraḥ samvignaḥ saṃsārān nirvāṇānuśaṃsadarśī /
T08suvrnavu:144: ārya kim idam iti bhikṣuṇābhihitam āyuṣman buddhavacanam iti /
T08suvrnavu:145: tasya śrutvā bhagavacchāsane mahān prasāda utpannaḥ pravrajyābhilāṣo mokṣābhilāś ca /
T08suvrnavu:146: tatas tasya bhikṣoḥ satkṛtya pādayor nipatya kathayaty ārya pravrajitum icchāmi /
T08suvrnavu:148: bhikṣuṇābhihitam āyuṣman kim anujñāto 'si mātāpitṛbhyām iti /
T08suvrnavu:150: bhikṣuḥ kathayati gacchāyuṣmān mātāpitarau tāvad avalokaya na hy ananujñātaṃ mātāpitṛbhyām vayaṃ pravrājayāma iti /
T08suvrnavu:153: [12] tataḥ suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāraḥ saṃsārabhayodvignamanāḥ svaniveśanaṃ gatvā mātuḥ pādayor nipatya kathayaty ambānujānīhi māṃ pravrajāmi svākhyāte dharmavinaye /
T08suvrnavu:156: putra tvam me ekaputrakaḥ priyo manāpaḥ kānto 'pratikūlo manorathaśataiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:157: kathan nāma tvaṃ mām apahāya pravrajasīti /
T08suvrnavu:158: sa kathayaty ambāvaśyaṃ bhāvī priyaviprayogas tad anujānīhi māṃ pravrajāmi svākhyāte dharmavinaya iti /
T08suvrnavu:159: tasya śrutvā mahān samvego jātaḥ sā bāṣpagadgadakaṇṭhī provāca /
T08suvrnavu:160: putra mā māṃ trir api vakṣyasi /
T08suvrnavu:161: mā me uṣṇaṃ śoṇitaṃ mukhād āgamiṣyatīti /
T08suvrnavu:163: yādṛśo 'sya vyavasāyo na śakṣyam evaṃ mayā nivārayitum /
T08suvrnavu:166: putra tava pitā buddhaśāsane kārāṅ kariṣyātīti mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:169: yady asāv āgata tvām anujñāsyati pravrajiṣyasīti /
T08suvrnavu:171: yadi bhūyo 'py enāṃ vakṣyāmi kadācid eṣā mahāntaṃ samvegam āpasyate /
T08suvrnavu:172: tad yāvan me pitā nāgacchati tāvat tiṣṭhāmīti /
T08suvrnavu:174: yadā ca suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāro vīthīm avatarati /
T08suvrnavu:175: tadā lokas tasya rūpodāryasampadaṃ dṛṣṭvā nirīkṣamāṇo na_atra tṛptim upayāti /
T08suvrnavu:176: sa mahājanakāyasya vallabho jātas tasya rūpaudārya sampadā samākṛṣṭamanaso 'tyantaṃ kāmavimukhatāṃ dṛṣṭvā mātā saṃlakṣayati /
T08suvrnavu:177: dhik kaṣṭaṃ yādṛśo 'sya vyavasāyas tadāpy eṣa mām apahāya pravrajiṣyatīti /
T08suvrnavu:178: tato nityaṃ śaṅkitamanasā tasyānukūlaṃ pravartitum ārabdhā //
T08suvrnavu:180: [13] suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāro 'bhīkṣṇam paṇḍitān śramaṇān brāhmaṇān sevate /
T08suvrnavu:181: sa tatra yat subhāṣitaṃ mokṣamātrānukūlaṃ śṛṇoti /
T08suvrnavu:183: divākarasya ca sārthavāhasya rājagṛhān nagarād bahir udyānaṃ puṣpaphalasalilasampannaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:184: tataḥ suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāras tat paitṛkam udyānaṃ dine dine gatvā subhāṣitapustakaṃ vācayaṃs tiṣṭhati /
T08suvrnavu:185: tena khalu samayena rājagṛhe nagare kāśisundarī nāma veśyā prativasati /
T08suvrnavu:186: strīrūpayauvanasampannā mahājanavallabhā rājñaś cājātaśatroḥ pracaṇḍanāmāmātyas tasya rājño 'tyartham bahumataḥ /
T08suvrnavu:187: sa kāśisundaryāṃ dārikāyām atyartaṃ saṃraktacittas tayā saha dine dine svam udyānaṅ gatvā ratikrīḍām anubhavati /
T08suvrnavu:189: [14] yāvad apareṇa samayena kāśisundarīdārikā sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitā rājagṛhān nirgatya pracaṇḍasyāmātyasyodyānaṃ saṃprasthitā /
T08suvrnavu:190: suvarṇavarṇaś ca kumāro rājagṛhān nagarān nirgatya svam udyānaṅ gacchati /
T08suvrnavu:191: adrākṣīt kāśisundarī dārikā suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāram atyantam abhirūpaṃ darśanīyaṃ prāsādikaṃ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetam uttaptasuvarṇavarṇayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgataṃ /
T08suvrnavu:192: sarvajanamanonayanaharaṃ suvarṇavarṇapītair vastrair avaguṇṭhitavigrahaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punar asyā etad abhavat /
T08suvrnavu:194: aho varṇapuṣkalatā kṛtabhāgyā sā nārī yasyā eṣa bharttā bhaviṣyatīti /
T08suvrnavu:196: mandabhāgyā sā nārī sā īdṛśena puruṣeṇa sārddhaṃ ratikrīḍān nānubhavati /
T08suvrnavu:199: yan nv aham enaṃ tathā pralobhayeyaṃ yathā mamānena saha saṃyogo bhaved iti /
T08suvrnavu:200: sā tasya purataḥ sthitvā nimittam upadarśayitum ārabdhā /
T08suvrnavu:201: sa mahātmā prakṛtyaiva kāmavimukhatvān nirvāṇapravaṇatvād vā ca na tāṃ samanvāharati /
T08suvrnavu:204: teneha māṃ na samanvāharaty eṣa codyānaṃ samprasthito 'ham api tatraiva gacchāmi /
T08suvrnavu:205: tatra cainaṃ pracchanne pralobhayiṣyāmīti sā tasya pṛṣṭhato 'nubaddhā suvarṇavarṇena kumāreṇopalakṣitā tenāgrataḥ praviśya tasyodyānasya dvāraṃ baddhaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:209: na yuktaṃ tava mayy evaṃ naiṣṭhuryam upadarśayitum iti /
T08suvrnavu:215: sarvathā na śakyam eṣa mayā rūpeṇa vā vacasā vā ārādhayituṃ sparśenainam ārādhayiṣyāmi /
T08suvrnavu:216: eṣa ca māṃ dṛṣṭvā dvāraṃ badhnāti /
T08suvrnavu:217: ka upāyaḥ syād yenāham enaṃ pracchannam āsādayeyaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:218: atha vāpratisaṃviditam evāsya śvaḥ prathamataram āgatya etam udyānaṃ praviśya sthāsyāmi
T08suvrnavu:219: parata enam āgatam āliṅganādibhiḥ gātrasaṃsparśanais tathārādhayiṣyāmi yathā me vaśago bhaviṣyatīti /
T08suvrnavu:221: taṃ ca divasaṃ pracanṇḍasyāmātyasyodyānaṃ na gatā //
T08suvrnavu:223: [16] pracaṇḍo 'py amātyaḥ sve udyāne tām udīkṣamānaś ciraṃ parikhinnaḥ sūryasyāṣṭaṅgamanakālasamaye
T08suvrnavu:224: nagaraṃ praviṣṭas tena sve gṛhe kāśisundaryā dūto 'nupreṣitaḥ kim arthaṃ tvam adya
T08suvrnavu:226: kāśisundarī dārikā vyākṣepaṃ kṛtavatī āryaputrādya me śirorujātīva bādhate yenodyānaṃ nāgateti /
T08suvrnavu:228: na tasyāḥ śirorujā bādhate 'pi tv eṣā suvarṇavarṇasya kumārasya sakāśam udyānaṃ gatā /
T08suvrnavu:232: yathā śvaḥ kāśisundarī dārikā na bhaviṣyati /
T08suvrnavu:234: pratikruṣṭaṃ caitad vairāṇāṃ yad uta strīvairam iti /
T08suvrnavu:235: sa krodhāgninā dahyamānahṛdayas tān niśāṃ kṛcchreṇātināmitavān /
T08suvrnavu:236: tataḥ prabhātāyāṃ rajanyām anyatamam āptapuruṣam āmantrayate /
T08suvrnavu:237: khaḍgam gṛhāṇa rājagṛhād bahir udyānaṃ gamiṣyāmi tatrāsti me kiñcid ātyayikaṃ prayojanam
T08suvrnavu:238: ity evaṃ svāminn iti sa puruṣaḥ khaḍgam ādāya tasya pṛṣṭhato 'nubaddhas tataḥ pracaṇḍo
T08suvrnavu:239: 'mātyas tena puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ rājagrān nirgatya divākarasya sārthavāhasyodyānaṃ praviśyāvasthitaḥ //
T08suvrnavu:241: [17] kāśisundary api dārikā vicitravastrālaṅkārālaṅkṛtaśarīrā rājagṛān nāgarān nirgatya divākarasya sārthavāhasyodyānaṅ gatā /
T08suvrnavu:242: sā tatra praviṣṭā yāvat paśyati pracaṇḍam amātyaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ saṃtrastā /
T08suvrnavu:243: saṃlakṣayaty eṣa prakṛtyaiva pracaṇḍo niyataṃ me 'dya mahāntam anarthaṅ karotīti pratinivarttitukāmābhūt /
T08suvrnavu:244: tataḥ pracaṇḍo 'mātyas tāṃ dṛṣṭvā krodhāgnijvalitamanās triśikhāṃ lalāṭe bhṛkurṭiṃ
T08suvrnavu:245: kṛtvā pradhāvitas tatas tāṃ sarabhasaṃ keśeṣu gṛhītvā nirdayam avāṅmukhīṃ pṛthivyāṃ
T08suvrnavu:246: pātayitvā samākṛṣṭavān evañ cāha tvam ihāgatya suvarṇavarṇena kumāreṇa sārddhaṃ paricārayasi /
T08suvrnavu:250: tad adya te tādṛśam maryādābandhāṃ karomi yena punar na bhavatī jīvalokaṃ drakṣyati /
T08suvrnavu:252: tac chrutvā kāśisundarī dārikā tadākarṣaṇaparākarṣaṇajaṃ duḥkham agaṇayitvā maraṇabhayabhītā bāṣpoparuddhyamānagadagadakaṇṭhī hā idānīn na bhaviṣyāmīti
T08suvrnavu:253: kampamānagātrī pracaṇḍasyāmātyasya pādayor nipatya karuṇadīnavilamvitair akṣarair uvāca prasīdatv āryaputro nārhasi māṃ praghātayitum iti nityāparādho mātṛgrāmaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:254: itaḥ prabhṛti na bhūya evaṅ kariṣyāmi /
T08suvrnavu:256: tad alam anena sāhasena prayaccha jīvitam iti /
T08suvrnavu:257: tasya durātmana evaṃ karuṇadīnavilamvitair akṣarair ucyamānasya krodhāgnir vardhata eva /
T08suvrnavu:258: tatas taṃ sahāyakam uvāca śīghram asyā anena khaḍgenotkṛttamūlaṃ śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyān nipātayety //
T08suvrnavu:260: [18] atha sa puruṣas tasya durātmano 'nyāyavaco duraktam upaśrutya kampitum ārabdhaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:262: aho nairghṛṇyam eṣā hi strī bahuprakāram asyopayuktā /
T08suvrnavu:263: tat kathan nāma svalpasyāparādhasyārthe praghātayitum icchati /
T08suvrnavu:264: aho vayam api jīvikābhayabhītā yena nāmāsyāśīviṣaprakhyasya puruṣādhamasya pārṣve tiṣṭhāmaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:266: kim atra prāptakālaṃ atha vā sphuṭam enaṃ vakṣyāmi kadācid eva sphuṭam ucyamānaḥ pratinivartetāsmāt pāpakād asaddharmād iti /
T08suvrnavu:267: viditvā samvignamanās tasyāś ca striyās tair atikaruṇair vilāpair dravīkṛtasantāno bāṣpāmbupariplutaq_īkṣaṇaḥ kṛtakarapuṭaḥ pracaṇḍam amātyam uvāca /
T08suvrnavu:268: prasīdatu svāmī nārhasi mām evaṃvidhe 'kārye niyojayitun nāhaṃ niṣādo nāpi vadhyaghātakaḥ
T08suvrnavu:269: kathaṃ hi nāma yat karmma vadhyaghātakānām api notsahate manas tatkarmaṇi pratārayati māṃ svāmī /
T08suvrnavu:270: eṣā ca strī prakāśātyartham abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sarvakalābhijñā rājagṛhanivāsino nānādigdeśābhyāgatasya ca vidagdhajanasyātīva vallabhā
T08suvrnavu:272: kathaṃ hi nāma svāmin prajñātamanuṣyasya vicakṣaṇasyāsminn anunayasthāne dveṣa utpannas tad alam īdṛśena lokadvayavirudhāvāhakena vyavasāyena
T08suvrnavu:273: prasīda nārhasi mām ātmanañ cānena duścaritāgninā dagdhum /
T08suvrnavu:276: prītim etām manuṣyāṇāṃ manye mārtimatīm iva /1/
T08suvrnavu:277: karuṇaiḥ karuṇair dīnair madhurair akṣarair iyaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:278: vijñapayati svāmiṃs te dṛṇāti mama mānasaṃ /2/
T08suvrnavu:279: kampate hṛdayam me 'dya śrutvā dīptaṃ vacas tava /
T08suvrnavu:280: ko 'sau nirghṛṇacittaḥ syād ya imāṃ hantum edhate /3/
T08suvrnavu:281: mlecchā api naināṃ hantum utsahante sunirghṛṇāḥ /
T08suvrnavu:282: kathan nu mama tāṃ hantuṃ svāmin utsahate manaḥ /4/
T08suvrnavu:283: paśūnām api yāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhavaty anunayo mahān /
T08suvrnavu:284: tasyāḥ ko manuṣyo bhūtvā śastreṇa prahariṣyati /5/
T08suvrnavu:285: tat prasīda tavāyuktam api śrotum idam vacaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:286: prāg eva acarituṃ svāmin karmmedam atidāruṇam iti /6/
T08suvrnavu:288: [19] atha sa durātmā vipannāśayatvād evam api hṛdayagrāhakair vacobhis tena puruṣeṇābhidhiyamāno naiva svacittaṃ pratilabhate //
T08suvrnavu:289: saroṣabhrūlatābhaṅgaraudreṇa ca mukhena taṃ puruṣam uvāca //
T08suvrnavu:290: bhoḥ puruṣa kas tavāsyāṃ upary anunayo yan nāma madīyām ājñāṃ vilaṅghya necchasy
T08suvrnavu:291: enāṃ praghātayituṃ sarvathā yadi tvam enāṃ praghātayiṣyasīty evaṃ kuśalan no cen
T08suvrnavu:292: na praghātayiṣyasi tavādya jīvitaṃ ca bhaviṣyatīti /
T08suvrnavu:293: tato 'sau puruṣas tasya tat karkaśaṃ vyavasāyaṃ buddhvā bhītaś cintayituṃ pravṛttaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:295: sa ced asyājñāṃ na kariṣyāmi niyatam adya māṃ jīvitād vyaparopayiṣyati /
T08suvrnavu:296: yo hi nāmaivaṃvidhiṃ mātṛgrāmaṃ bahuprakāram upayuktaṃ praghātayitum udyataḥ sa māṃ na praghātayiṣyatīti /
T08suvrnavu:297: kuta etat kathañ ca nāma manuṣyo 'ham ity ātmānam manye /
T08suvrnavu:298: īdṛśyā janapadakalyāṇinyāḥ striyāḥ śarīre śastraṃ nipātayiṣyāmi /
T08suvrnavu:299: sarvathā kāmaṃ svajīvitavināśo na tv evāsyāḥ prahāraṃ dāsyāmīti niścayaṃ kṛtavāṃs
T08suvrnavu:300: tasya buddhir utpannā yady ahaṃ khaḍgam ādāya niṣpalāyeyaṃ evaṃ mayā tv ātmā parirakṣito bhaviṣyati /
T08suvrnavu:302: sa khaḍgam ādāya tasmād udyānād niṣkramya sarvajavena niḥpalānaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:303: pracaṇḍo py amātyas tasya pṛṣṭhato dvārakoṣṭhaṃ yāvad anubaddhaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:305: [20] tataḥ kāśisundarī dārikā gatapratyāgataprāṇam ivātmānam manyamano tvaritatvaritam utthāya niḥpalāyāmīti prākārasamīpam abhigatā /
T08suvrnavu:306: sā coccaḥ prākāraṃ na śaknoti vilaṅghayituṃ /
T08suvrnavu:307: pracaṇḍaś cāmātyaḥ pratinivṛtya yāvat tasmin pradeśe kāśisundarīṃ dārikān na paśyati /
T08suvrnavu:308: itaś cāmutaś ca vyavalokayitum ārabdho yāvat paśyati prākārasamīpam abhigatāṃ sa tvaritatvaritaṃ tasyāḥ samīpaṃ gantum ārabdhaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:310: tena sā dakṣiṇe caraṇe daṣṭā sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā niṣpalānaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:312: eṣaḥ ca pracaṇḍo mām āgatya praghātayiṣyatīti /
T08suvrnavu:316: tatas tena durātmanā nirghṛṇahṛdayena tīvradveṣaparyākulīkṛtamanasā kāśisundarīṃ dārikāṃ tasmād atimuktakalatāgahanād ākṛṣya tasyāḥ śirasi pārṣṇiprahāro dattaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:317: sukumārā sā strī tena prahāreṇa viṣavegena ca mūrcchitā pracaṇḍo 'py amātyas tān
T08suvrnavu:318: nirīkṣitum ārabdho yāvat paśyati niśceṣṭāṃ bhūmau nipatitāṃ tasyaitad abhavan mṛteyam idānīṃ gacchāmīti /
T08suvrnavu:319: tataś ca māṃ mā kaścid drakṣyatīti /
T08suvrnavu:325: [21] suvarṇavarṇaś ca kumāro rājagṛhān niṣkramya svam udyānam anuprāptaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:326: yāvat paśyati kāśisundarīṃ dārikām itaś cāmutaś ca samāhṛṣṭāṃ muktakeśīṃ niśceṣṭāṃ bhūmau nipatitāṃ dṛṣṭvā cāsya mahāsamvega utpannaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:327: tenopalakṣitaṃ kenāpy eṣā durātmanā nirghṛṇahṛdayena tyaktaparalokena vairānubaddhenāhānīya praghātitā bhaviṣyati /
T08suvrnavu:328: dhik kaṣṭam īdṛśā api nāma sattvā bhavanti /
T08suvrnavu:330: tena tad udyānaṃ sarvaṃ pratyavekṣitaṃ yāvan na kiñcit paśyati tasyaiva tad abhavad eṣā strī prajñātā 'sminn udyāne praghātitā /
T08suvrnavu:332: sarvathā durātmanā kenāpi svadaurātmyam antargataṃ prakaṭīkurvatā mana mastake 'yaśo 'śanir nipātita iti /
T08suvrnavu:333: sa caivaṃ samvignamanāḥ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyasthitaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:336: praviśya ca tad udyānaṃ pratyavekṣitum ārabdhāḥ /
T08suvrnavu:337: yāvat paśyanti kāśisundarīṃ dārikām itaś cāmutaś ca samāhṛṣṭāṃ muktakeśīṃ niśceṣṭāṃ bhūmau nipatitāṃ /
T08suvrnavu:338: dṛṣṭvā suvarṇavarṇasya kumārasya pūrvakarmavipākasāmarthyān na tāṃ kaścit paricchinatti /
T08suvrnavu:344: suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāraṃ muktvā na kañcid anyaṃ paśyanti /
T08suvrnavu:347: sa kathayati bhavanto 'ham api na jāne mayāpy eṣā eva dṛṣṭeti /
T08suvrnavu:349: [23] atha te rājapuruṣāḥ parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ /
T08suvrnavu:350: bhavanta eṣa kumāro 'tyantavinīto nāsyedaṃ karma saṃbhāvyate /
T08suvrnavu:351: atra ca na kañcid anyaṃ paśyāmaḥ sarvathā paramasaṅkaṭam anupraviṣṭāḥ smaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:355: etāṃ striyaṃ kumārañ ca karaṇamaṇḍapaṃ nayāmas tatrāmātyā eva paricchetsyantīti /
T08suvrnavu:356: tatas te rājapuruṣās tāṃ striyaṃ śivikām āropya suvarṇavarṇañ ca kumāram ādāya karaṇamaṇḍapaṅ
T08suvrnavu:357: gatās tatra ca karaṇamaṇḍape pracaṇḍo 'mātyaḥ pratipattyaivānukūlair vyavahāribhiḥ
T08suvrnavu:359: sannipatito yadbhūyasā tān eva rājapuruṣān āgamayamānas tena te dūrata eva dṛṣṭāḥ /
T08suvrnavu:360: pṛṣṭāś ca bhavantaḥ kim idam iti /
T08suvrnavu:361: tair ākhyātam eṣāsmābhiḥ strī divārakasya sārthavāhasyodyāne kālagatā dṛṣṭā tañ codyānam asmābhiḥ pratyavekṣitatam /
T08suvrnavu:362: suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāraṃ muktvā na kañcid anyaṃ paśyāmaḥ eṣa cāsmābhiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ kumāraḥ /
T08suvrnavu:364: anenākhyātam aham api bhavanto na jāne mayāpy eṣā evam eva dṛṣṭeti /
T08suvrnavu:365: tad idānīṃ svāmina evaṃ pravicārayantv iti /
T08suvrnavu:368: bhavanto mūhūrtaṃ tāvad avīkṣadhvaṃ yāvad ahaṃ rājño nivedayāmīti /
T08suvrnavu:369: tena rājño 'jātaśatror gṛhaṃ gatvā daurvārikaḥ puruṣaḥ pṛṣṭo bhoḥ puruṣadevaḥ kiṃ karotīti /
T08suvrnavu:370: tenākhyātam upariprāsādatalagato niḥpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
T08suvrnavu:371: labdhapraṇayo 'sau tena pratihārī preṣitā gaccha devasya nivedayāmātyā vijñapayanti /
T08suvrnavu:372: divākarasya sārthavāhasya putreṇodyāne kāśisundarī dārikā praghātitā /
T08suvrnavu:375: tayā gatvā rājño niveditaṃ rājā tatra ratikrīḍāyām atīva śaktaḥ kathayati /
T08suvrnavu:376: gacchāmātyān evam vada yūyam evaṃ nipuṇaṃ pravicārayadhvam iti /
T08suvrnavu:377: tayā nirgatya pracaṇḍasyāmātyasya niveditam evaṃ devaḥ samājñāpayatīti /
T08suvrnavu:379: [25] tataḥ pracaṇḍo 'mātyaḥ karaṇamaṇḍapam āgatya tān rājapuruṣān uvāca /
T08suvrnavu:382: bhavanto 'nena kumāreṇeyaṅ kāśisundarī dārikā udyāne praghātitā /
T08suvrnavu:383: gacchatainaṃ durācāraṃ paścād bāhubandhanaṃ gāḍhaṃ kṛtvā kharasvareṇa paṭena vādyamānena
T08suvrnavu:384: rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu śravaṇamukheṣv anuśrāvya dakṣiṇena nagaradvāreṇa nirṇamayya
T08suvrnavu:385: mahāśmaśān nītvā śūle samāropayata mṛtañ cainaṃ kāśisundaryā dārikayā sahaikāñ citām
T08suvrnavu:387: atha te vadhyaghātakāḥ suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāram atyartham abhirūpam uttaptasuvarṇaparvvataśṛṅgam iva paramayā śriyā jvalantam udvīkṣya samvignāḥ parasparam ūcuḥ /
T08suvrnavu:388: bhavantaḥ kiñcāpi vayam vadhyaghātakās tat katham īdṛśamatidurllabhadarśanaṃ puruṣaviśeṣaṃ praghātayiṣyāmaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:389: sarvathā kāmam asmākaṃ svajīvitavināśo na tv evainaṃ praghātayiṣyāmaḥ iti /
T08suvrnavu:391: [26] pracaṇḍo 'mātyas tān parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kurvāṇāṅ dṛṣṭvā pṛcchati /
T08suvrnavu:396: kiñcāpi vayam vadhyaghātakā api notsahāmahe īdṛśaṃ puruṣaviśeṣaṃ mahājanavallabhaṃ praghātayitum iti /
T08suvrnavu:398: bhavanto yadi yūyam enaṃ na praghātayiṣyatha /
T08suvrnavu:399: yuṣmākam evādya saputrakalatrabāndhavānāṃ jīvitāni na bhaviṣyantīti /
T08suvrnavu:402: yo hi nāma suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāram evam atidurlabhadarśanaṃ puruṣaviśeṣaṃ parityaktum udyataḥ yo 'smān saputrakalatrabandhavān praghātayiṣyatīti
T08suvrnavu:407: eṣā kumāro mahājanavallbhas tad enan tāvad vīthīm avatarāmaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:408: sthānam etad vidyate yan mahājanakāya evainaṃ pratimocayiṣyati /
T08suvrnavu:409: ko hy enaṃ praghātyamānam upekṣituṃ samartha iti /
T08suvrnavu:412: tañ ca tathā rūpaudāryasampadā vibhrājamānam ālokya na śaknuvanti spraṣṭuṃ tato vepamānāṅgapratyaṅgā bāṣpoparudhyamānagadgadakaṇṭhāḥ kranditum ārabdhāḥ /
T08suvrnavu:413: hā kaṣṭam īdṛśā api vayaṃ pāpakarmakāriṇo yenaivamvidhe kārye niyojyāmahe iti /
T08suvrnavu:415: [27] tataḥ pracaṇḍenāmātyena bhūyaḥ sakarkaśam ājñaptāḥ kim parivilambadhve /
T08suvrnavu:417: tair asau bāṣpāmbupariplutekṣaṇair vepamānair gṛhītas tenaiva suvarṇapītena vastreṇa paścād bāhuko baddhaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:418: tañ ca paścād bāhugāḍhabandhanabaddham ālokya pracaṇḍam amātyaṃ muktvā sarva eva
T08suvrnavu:420: hā kaṣṭam idānīm eva durlabhadarśanaḥ kumāro na bhaviṣyatīti /
T08suvrnavu:421: tatas tair vadhyaghātakair vīthyām avatārito yathāsminn antare kolāhalo jātas tañ
T08suvrnavu:424: suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāraṃ paścād bāhugāḍhabandhanabaddham ālokya samvignamanāḥ sasambhramaṃ praṣṭum ārabdha /
T08suvrnavu:426: tatas te vadhyaghātakāḥ bāṣpoparudhyamānagadgadakaṇṭhāḥ krandanta ūcuḥ /
T08suvrnavu:427: bhavanto 'nena kumāreṇa kila kāśisundarī dārikā praghātiteti vadhāya parityakto rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣv anuśrāvyate /
T08suvrnavu:428: na cirād eva mahāśmaśānaṃ nītvā praghātyata iti /
T08suvrnavu:430: [28] tac chrutvā sa mahājanakāyas tadviyogaduḥkhābhyāhata ekaraveṇoccair vikroṣṭum ārabdhaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:431: hā hā katham ayaṃ kumāra evamabhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopeta uttaptasuvarṇavarṇayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ sarvajanamanonayanaharaḥ
T08suvrnavu:432: paṇḍito vinītaḥ peśalo dakṣaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmmakāmaḥ sattvavatsalaḥ praghātyate /
T08suvrnavu:433: kim astaṅgatāḥ sādhavaḥ kim antarhito dharmaḥ kim adharmasyaiva niḥsapatnaṃ rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:436: dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā yam asmākaṃ parā prītir abhūt purā /1/
T08suvrnavu:437: tam enaṃ sāmprataṃ dṛṣṭvā vadhyaghātair adhiṣṭhitaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:440: tasyopari kathan nāma rājñā daṇḍo nipātyate /3/
T08suvrnavu:441: nirīkṣamāṇā yan nityaṃ tṛptin nāyānti dehinaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:442: vadhāya sa kathaṃ tyakto ghṛṇā tyaktādya mantribhiḥ /4/
T08suvrnavu:443: cāritryaṃ vinayopetaṃ yasya khyātaṃ muner iva /
T08suvrnavu:444: kathaṃ saṃbhāvyate tasya hy aparādho 'yam īdṛśaḥ /5/
T08suvrnavu:445: adharmo vata jāgarti dharmaḥ supto 'tha vā mṛtaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:446: yad evaṃ guṇino 'py asya viyogo 'yam upasthitaḥ /6/
T08suvrnavu:448: [29] sa ca strīṇāṃ atīva priyas tatra kāścit striyas tadviyogaduḥkhābhyāhatāḥ pṛthivyām āvartanaparivartanaṃ kurvanti /
T08suvrnavu:451: ekaikās tatra putraviyogasadṛśaṃ viyogaduḥkham anubhavanti sma /
T08suvrnavu:452: mahājanavallabho 'sau mahātmā rājagṛhanagaranivāsī janakāyo yadbhūyasā tadviyogaduḥkhābhyāhato vikroṣṭum ārabdhaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:456: [30] divākarasya sārthavāhasya gṛhād dārikā vīthīm avatīrṇā /
T08suvrnavu:457: tayā eṣa vṛttāntaḥ śrutas tataḥ krandamānā uras tāḍayantī tvaritatvaritaṃ gṛhaṃ gatvā
T08suvrnavu:458: yena suvarṇavarṇasya kumārasya mātā tenopasaṃkrāntā upasaṃkramya tasyāḥ purata ātmānaṃ kṣiptavatī /
T08suvrnavu:459: tataḥ suvarṇavarṇasya kumārasya mātā saṃtrastā pṛcchati /
T08suvrnavu:462: ārye suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāraḥ paścād bāhugāḍhabandhanabaddho vadhyaghātakair adhiṣṭhito
T08suvrnavu:463: 'nena kilodyāne kāśisundarī dārikā praghātitety avicāryaiva vadhāya parityakto rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣv anuśrāvyate /
T08suvrnavu:464: na cirād eva mahāśmaśānaṃ nītvā praghātyata iti /
T08suvrnavu:466: [31] tac chrutvā suvarṇavarṇasya kumārasya mātā tīvraduḥkhābhyāhatā mūrcchitā bhūmau nipatitā /
T08suvrnavu:467: tato jalābhiṣekapratyāgataprāṇā utthāya hā putra hā putreti vikrośantī keśā luñcamānā uras tāḍayantī kampamānā muhur muhur moham upagacchantī gṛhān nirgatya vīthīm avatīrṇā /
T08suvrnavu:468: sā putraviyogaśokābhyāhatā viklavahṛdayā tattad vilapantī ekaikaṃ pṛcchati /
T08suvrnavu:469: katareṇa pathā suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāro nīto bhaviṣyatīti /
T08suvrnavu:470: hā putrakaṃ na paśyāmi paritrāyadhvaṃ paritrāyadhvaṃ putrakam me darśayateti /
T08suvrnavu:473: [32] yathā yathā sārthavāhapatnī suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāran na paśyati /
T08suvrnavu:474: tathā tathā tīvrataraśokaduḥkhābhyāhatā uccair vikrośantī ekaikasya pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭī vijñāpayati /
T08suvrnavu:475: paritrāyadhvaṃ paritrāyadhvam me śīghram avakāśam anuprayacchata yāvat kumāro nātikramyate anena pathā /
T08suvrnavu:476: anena pathā putrako me suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāro nīyate yathā ca taṃ paśyāmi tathā me prasādaṃ kartum arhatheti /
T08suvrnavu:477: sā ca tatrāvakāśam alabhamānā hā kathaṃ bhoḥ putra na labha iti /
T08suvrnavu:479: tato jaloddhṛteva matsī pṛthivyām āvarttanaparivartanaṅ kartum ārabdhā /
T08suvrnavu:494: hā paṇḍita vinīta viśārada manojña dakṣa /
T08suvrnavu:504: hā katham avicāryaivam anātho vadhāya nīyate sa iti /
T08suvrnavu:506: [33] punar api ca kṛtakarapuṭā paurān vijñapayantī /
T08suvrnavu:508: hā hatāsmi nirānandā kim idaṃ vartate mama /
T08suvrnavu:509: svapno 'yam atha vā moha āhosvic cittavibhramaḥ /1/
T08suvrnavu:511: paurān vijñāpayām āsa viruvantī muhur muhuḥ /2/
T08suvrnavu:512: avinīto virūpo vā na ca me hṛdayapriyaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:513: yad evam adhyupekṣadhvaṃ nīyamānaṃ sutam mama /3/
T08suvrnavu:514: anukampā sa ced asti pakṣapāto guṇeṣu vā /
T08suvrnavu:515: tathā me kriyatāṃ paurā yathā paśyāmi putrakaṃ /4/
T08suvrnavu:519: na viśrabdha pariṣvakto bahuśo nāpi cumbitaḥ /6/
T08suvrnavu:521: evam eva kathan nāma nīyate bhoḥ suto mama /7/
T08suvrnavu:522: śūnyā me 'dya diśaḥ sarvā vepate me kaḍevaraṃ /
T08suvrnavu:523: dahyate hṛdayañ cāpi moham eti ca mānasaṃ /8/
T08suvrnavu:525: hā hā na bhūyo drakṣyāmi sutaṃ hṛdayavallabhaṃ /9/
T08suvrnavu:526: nūnaṃ kṛtan mayā pāpam anyajanmani dāruṇaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:528: yena satyena cittam me śatruṣv api na pāpakaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:529: mucyatāṃ vyasanād asmāt tena satyena me suta iti /11/
T08suvrnavu:531: [34] divākaraś ca sārthavāhaḥ samudrāt saṃsiddhayānpātro rājagṛham anuprāptaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:532: sa rājagṛhan nagaraṃ praviśan nimittāny apraśastāni paśyati /
T08suvrnavu:533: tasya hṛdayaṃ kampitum ārabdhaṃ aṅgāni sīditum ārabdhāni /
T08suvrnavu:534: netraṃ sphuritum ārabdhaṃ śakunayaś cāsya purataḥ kharam vāśitum ārabdhāḥ /
T08suvrnavu:535: sa nimittakuśalaḥ śakunirute ca kṛtavī cintayituṃ pravṛttaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:536: yathaitāni nimittāny apraśastāni samanupaśyāmi dhruvam adya suvarṇavarṇasya kumārasya mahān upadravaḥ samupasthito bhaviṣyati /
T08suvrnavu:537: tathā hy etāni nimittāni tadviyogaṃ sūcayantīty āha ca /
T08suvrnavu:538: yathā sphurati netram me yathā rauti vihaṅgamaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:540: yathā cāṅgāni sīdanti vepate hṛdayañ ca me /
T08suvrnavu:544: vepathur apragalbhapadasañcāraḥ kathañcid rājagṛham anupraviṣṭo yāvac chṛṇoti mahājanakāyasya krandanaśabdaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:545: sa tam ākrandanaśabdam anusaran vīthīm avatīrṇo yāvat paśyati mahājanakāyaṃ rākṣasopadrutam
T08suvrnavu:546: iva nagaraṃ viyogaduḥkhābhyāhataṃ krandamānaṃ tena sammukhāgato 'nyatamaḥ puruṣaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:548: sa ca tan na jānāti yathāyam evāsau divākaraḥ sārthavāha iti /
T08suvrnavu:549: tenākhyātaṃ divākarasya sārthavāhasya putraḥ suvarṇavarṇo nāma kumāro 'tyantaṃ rūpādiguṇasampadā
T08suvrnavu:550: yuktas tena kilodyāne kāśisundarī dārikā praghātitety avicāryaiva vadhāya parityakto
T08suvrnavu:552: na cirād eva mahāśmaśānaṃ nītvā praghātyata iti /
T08suvrnavu:553: tac chrutvā divākaraḥ sārthavāhaḥ putraviyogaduḥkhābhyāhataḥ sahasaiva mūrcchito bhūmau nipatitaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:554: tato jalābhiṣekapratyāgataprāṇa utthāya bāṣpormitaraṅgāpūryamāṇavadanakamalaḥ sambhrāntaḥ sa nirīkṣamāṇa hā katareṇa pathā suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāro nīto bhaviṣyatīti /
T08suvrnavu:556: yāvat paśyati tāvat paśyati bhāryāṃ muktakeśīm ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyām uras tāḍayantīṃ
T08suvrnavu:557: ārtasvaraṃ tat tadvilapantīṃ sutaviyogajāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanaāpāṃ
T08suvrnavu:558: vedanāṃ vedayamānāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punas tīvramanyūparuddhagadgadāyamānakaṇṭho bāṣpāmbupariplutekṣaṇas
T08suvrnavu:561: [36] sā taṃ dṛṣṭvā dviguṇataraśokaśalyābhyāhata bāṣpormmitaraṅgāpūryamāṇavadanakamalā sasambhramā tvaritaṃ tvaritam utthāya tasya purata ātmānaṃ kṣiptavatī /
T08suvrnavu:562: sā tato divākareṇa sārthavāhenārtasvaraṃ krandamānā pariṣvajyotthāpitā /
T08suvrnavu:564: sārthavāhaṃ paritrāyasva paritrāyasva putrabhikṣām me 'nuprayacchety āha ca /
T08suvrnavu:567: yasya janmani te svāmin ānandaaḥ paramo 'bhavat /
T08suvrnavu:568: sa eva māraṇāyādya nīyate vallabhaḥ sutaḥ /2/
T08suvrnavu:575: sarvam etad dhi kriyate etac cakṣur nirudhyate /
T08suvrnavu:577: tac chīghraṃ kriyatāṃ yatna[ḥ] sutasya parimuktaye /
T08suvrnavu:578: sarvasvam api dattvādya putraṃ māñ ca vimocaya /7/
T08suvrnavu:579: ṛdhyantu tava saṅkalpā ṛdhyatv āśāsitum manaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:580: apy eva tañ ca jīvantaṃ drakṣyāmi tava putrakam iti /8/
T08suvrnavu:582: [37] atha divākaraḥ sārthavāhaḥ putraviyogaśokaduḥkhābhyāhato 'pi dhairyam avalaṃbya cittena kṛtakarapuṭaḥ paurān uvāca //
T08suvrnavu:583: bhoḥ bhoḥ paurāḥ śrūyatāṃ kathan nāma yuktaṃ bhavatāmamedaṃ vyasanam upasthitam upekṣituṃ /
T08suvrnavu:584: katham aṭavyām ivāvicārya nagaramadhyena yuṣmākaṃ paśyatām eva prakāśaguṇo 'pi me kumāro vadhāya nīyate /
T08suvrnavu:587: kathaṃ kumārasya muktaye na prayatnadhvam iti /
T08suvrnavu:588: te kathayanti sārthavāha īdṛśo 'yaṃ kumāro guṇavāṃs tavaivaiaksyedaṃ vyasanam api tu sarveṣām evāsmākaṃ kin tūpāyan na paśyāmaḥ kumārasya pratimuktaye
T08suvrnavu:591: bhavantaḥ parijñāta eva yuṣmābhir ayaṃ kumāro yathātyantaṃ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ sattvavatsalaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:592: cittam apy ayam īdṛśe 'kārye na samartha utpādayituṃ prāg evācarituṃ /
T08suvrnavu:594: yadi kumāraḥ pravicāryate niyatam asmād vyasanāt parimucyate /
T08suvrnavu:595: yūyañ ca sādhavaḥ sarvajanasādhāraṇās tad yuṣmākaṃ vijñāpayatāṃ na kaścid doṣo dṛśyate /
T08suvrnavu:598: yat kāruṇyacittaṃ paryupasthāpya gatvā rājā vijñapyatāṃ /
T08suvrnavu:599: tanmantriṇo vā kadācic ca te 'rtharucitvāt suyuktam api yuṣmadvacanam anyathā na manayanti /
T08suvrnavu:601: tataḥ sarvasvam api madīyaṃ dattvā tathā prasādaḥ karaṇīyo yathā kumāraḥ pravicāryata iti /
T08suvrnavu:604: teṣu vacanāt kumāraguṇānurāgāc cābhyupagataṃ tataḥ taiḥ pravīṇā vyavahāriṇaḥ paurikā rājakulaṃ preṣitā uktāś ca /
T08suvrnavu:605: sa ced adya kumāraḥ punar nipuṇataraṃ pravicāryate vayam api rājñaḥ suvarṇalakṣam anuprayacchāma iti /
T08suvrnavu:606: tatas te paurikā vyavahāriṇaḥ karaṇamaṇḍapaṅgatāḥ pracaṇḍena cāmātyena dūrata eva dṛṣṭā uktāś ca bhavantaḥ kim āgamanaprayojanam iti /
T08suvrnavu:607: tair ākhyātaṃ rājagṛhanivāsinaś ca paurā evaṃ vijñapayanty ayaṃ suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāro
T08suvrnavu:608: 'tyarthaṃ rūpaudāryasampadā yuktatvān mahājanavallabhaś ced asya viyogād rājagṛhanivāsino
T08suvrnavu:610: dharmābhiratatvād vinayādiguṇopetatvāc cāsya na kaścid enam aparādham abhiśraddadhāti /
T08suvrnavu:612: divākaraś ca sārthavāhaḥ sarvasvam asmadvijñaptyā suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāraḥ pratinivartya punar nipuṇataraṃ pravicāryatām evaṃ kṛte cāsmākaṃ vijñāptisākalyaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati /
T08suvrnavu:616: bhavantaḥ kim atra na vicāritaṃ yad bhūyo vicāryate yac ca kathayata rājakośa eṣa saṃvarddhito bhavatīti /
T08suvrnavu:617: tata kiṃ vayam anyāyopāttair dravyai rājakośaṃ samvarddhayiṣyāmaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:619: sarvathā yūyam avaśyaṃ vaiśālakānāṃ prayogeṇāsya rājño 'narthaṅ karttukāmā yenaivam upāyenāsya rājño 'varṇaṃ niścārayitum icchatha /
T08suvrnavu:620: anyāyakāry eva rājā yad evam avicāryaṃ janapadaṃ vināśayatīti /
T08suvrnavu:622: sa tān nirbhartsayitvā catvāro 'sya kṛtāntapuruṣasadṛśāḥ santi manuṣyā atiraudrakarmāṇaḥ satatābhyāsavaśān nirghṛṇīkṛtasantānā niṣkaruṇās tān āhūya kathayati /
T08suvrnavu:624: asmādvacanācca vaktavyā śīghram enaṃ nagarān niṣkāsya yathā sandiṣṭena vidhinā praghātayata /
T08suvrnavu:625: na ca yuṣmābhir māṃ muktvā rājānam vānayasya kasyacid vacanenāyaṃ moktavyaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:626: evaṃ hi kurvatāṃ śreyo 'nyathāhaṃ bhavatām mahāmarāryādābandaṅ karomīti /
T08suvrnavu:627: evaṃ svāminn iti te rājapuruṣās tasya pratiśrutya khaḍgapāṇayaḥ saṃprasthitās /
T08suvrnavu:629: [40] te vadhyaghātakā vyākṣepaśatāni kurvāṇāḥ śainaḥ śainaḥ suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāraṃ
T08suvrnavu:630: rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣv anuśrāvayantaḥ paribhrāmayanto 'ho vata kumārasya kecit
T08suvrnavu:631: mocayitāro bhaviṣyanty apy evaṃ vayam īdṛśam akāryaṃ na kurma iti /
T08suvrnavu:632: te rājapuruṣā nikṛṣṭakhaḍgapāṇayas samprāptā tais teṣām vadhyaghātakānāṃ yathā sandiṣṭam ākhyātaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:633: uktāś ca yady enaṃ śīghraṃ nagarān niṣkrāmya yathā sandiṣṭena vidhinā na praghātayata /
T08suvrnavu:634: vayaṃ yuṣmān sāmpratam eva praghātayāma iti /
T08suvrnavu:635: te tān atisekanikṛṣṭān khaḍgavyagraṣṭān yamapuruṣān ivālokya saṃtrastās tato maraṇabhayabhītāś cintayituṃ pravṛttāḥ hā kaṣṭaṃ na kenacit kumārasya paritrāṇaṃ kṛtaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:637: bāṣpāmbupariplutekṣaṇais tai rājapuruṣair adhiṣṭhitāḥ suvarṇavarṇaṃ nagarān niṣkrāmayitum ārabdhāḥ /
T08suvrnavu:639: [41] tañ ca nagarān niṣkāsyamānam ālokyānekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi ekaraveṇoccair vikroṣṭum ārabdhāni hā kaṣṭam eṣa /
T08suvrnavu:648: amī divākarasya sārthavāhasya mūrtimantaḥ prāṇā apahriyante /
T08suvrnavu:649: hā kaṣṭaṃ kathaṃ nāma kumāro 'ṭavyām evaṃ paribhrāmya niṣkāsito na kenacid asya paritrāṇaṃ kṛtaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:650: eṣa sāmprataṃ rājagṛhān nagarāc candramā mṛtyurāhuṇā grasyate /
T08suvrnavu:652: etad rājagṛhanagaranivāsināṃ paurāṇāṃ netrāmṛtam adarśanapathe vyavasthāpyate /
T08suvrnavu:656: eṣa rājagṛhanagaranivāsināṃ paurāṇāṃ hṛdayavallabho vināśāya nīyate /
T08suvrnavu:657: kam idānīṃ rājagṛhanivāsinaḥ paurā animiṣam avalokayiṣyanti /
T08suvrnavu:658: kam idānīṃ dṛṣṭvā prītimanaso bhaviṣyantīti nirāśībhūtāḥ //
T08suvrnavu:661: niḥkāsitaḥ suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāro rājagṛhān nagarād iti /
T08suvrnavu:663: tatas te paurikā vyavahāriṇas tac chrutvā nirāśībhūtās tair āgatya teṣāṃ paurāṇām etat prakaraṇaṃ vistareṇāveditaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:666: bhavanto 'pi kalirājena tādṛśaḥ pitā dhārmiko dharmarājā jīvitād vyavaropitaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:667: idānīm ārabdha evaṃvidhān api prakhyātaguṇān mahājanavallabhān puruṣaviśeṣān asaṃdṛśyān praghātayituṃ /
T08suvrnavu:669: aho 'viśeṣajñatā mantriṇāṃ yo nāmaivam atyantarūpaudāryasampannatvāc ca vinītatvāc ca pūjām arhati sa eva guṇavān puruṣaviśeṣaḥ katham avicārya badhāya parityajyate /
T08suvrnavu:670: athavā kāla evāyam īdṛśaḥ samupasthito yad asanto vivarddhante /
T08suvrnavu:672: kālopakarṣya daurātmyam udbhāvayanto divākarasya sārthavāhasya etat prakaraṇaṃ vistareṇākhyātavantaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:674: [43] tac chrutvā vihatāśo divākaraḥ sārthavāhas tīvra śokaduḥkhābhyāhato mūrcchito bhūmau patitaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:675: tato jalapariṣekapratyāgataprāṇo viṣaṇṇamanā nirānandaḥ sāṃprataṃ putrako me praghātyata iti /
T08suvrnavu:677: locanānanda hā putra hā me kulavibhūṣaṇa /
T08suvrnavu:679: vimuhyate me hṛdayaṃ bhramanti ca diśo 'dhunā /
T08suvrnavu:682: hā kathaṃ dāruṇaṃ tāta tava vyasanam āgataṃ /3/
T08suvrnavu:686: yair evaṃ vinayopetas tvaṃ putra na vicāritaḥ /5/
T08suvrnavu:689: viśeṣo dhik sādhujano nūnam astaṅgato hṛdi /
T08suvrnavu:690: guṇavān api yat putra nirākrandaḥ praghātyase /7/
T08suvrnavu:691: tat kiṃ viproṣitāḥ sarvā nagarasyāsya devatāḥ /
T08suvrnavu:692: ghātyamānam upekṣante yad evaṃ guṇinaṃ janaṃ /8/
T08suvrnavu:693: sendrāḥ salokapālāś ca devā ye ca maharddhikāḥ /
T08suvrnavu:694: anukampām upādāya te me rakṣantu putrakaṃ /9/
T08suvrnavu:696: te 'nukampāṃ puraskṛtya parirakṣantu me sutam iti /10/
T08suvrnavu:698: [44] tasya buddhir utpannā kim artham ahaṃ viṣīdāmi yan nv ahaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ sakalajagad ekabāndhavaṃ mahākāruṇikaṃ samunasmareyaṃ sa hi bhagavān anāthānān nāthaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:702: tathā hi tena bhagavatā kṛcchrasaṅkaṭasambādhaprāptā bahavaḥ sattvās tebhyas tebhyo mahābhayebhyaḥ parimocitā /
T08suvrnavu:703: tathā mahāsamudram adhyagatā vaṇijo makarasya bhayasantrastāḥ samanusmaraṇamātreṇaiva tasmān maraṇabhayāt paritrātāḥ /
T08suvrnavu:704: tathā naika puruṣaghātakenaikarabhasenodyataśastreṇāṅgulīmālena ghātyamānā tajjananī tasmāj jīvitopacchedabhayāt paritrātā /
T08suvrnavu:707: yakṣasyāhārārtham upanāmitas tadvadvanasamīpastho hastaka āṭavakas tasmān maraṇabhayāt paritrātā //
T08suvrnavu:708: samarthaḥ sa bhagavān me putram asmāt saṅkaṭāt parimocayituṃ /
T08suvrnavu:709: yan nv ahaṃ tam eva bhagavantaṃ mahākaruṇikaṃ parmavatsalasvabhāvaṃ samanusmareyam iti /
T08suvrnavu:710: samīpastham anyatam upāsakaṃ pṛṣṭavān idānīṃ bhagavān kutra viharatīti /
T08suvrnavu:711: tato 'sav upāsako bhagavantam anusmṛtya bāṣpoparudhyamānagadgadakaṇṭham uvāca /
T08suvrnavu:713: yaḥ sārthavāho lokasya yo loke sukhadāyakaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:716: nirvṛtaḥ sa jino loke dīpaḥ snehakṣayād iti /2/
T08suvrnavu:718: [45] tac chrutvā divākaraḥ sārthavāho bhagavadviyogād dviguṇīkṛtaśokaśalyābhyāhato mūrcchito bhūmau nipapāta /
T08suvrnavu:719: tato jalapariṣekapratyāgataprāṇa utthāya yasyāṃ diśi bhagavān parinirvṛtas tadabhimukho uccair vikroṣṭum ārabdhaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:727: anāthaḥ khalv ayaṃ lokaḥ kaṃ nāthaṃ saṃśrayiṣyati /4/
T08suvrnavu:728: ye ca te dharmato jātā vineyajanaputrakāḥ /
T08suvrnavu:729: tvayā vihīnās te sarve kariṣyanti kam āśrayaṃ /5/
T08suvrnavu:731: vihatāśaṃ janaṃ kṛtvā kām āśāṃ tvaṃ gato mune /6/
T08suvrnavu:733: ko nu vakṣyati saddharmam adhunā nirvṛte tvayi /7/
T08suvrnavu:734: hā hato 'yam anya loko lokaḥ sāmarakinnaraḥ /
T08suvrnavu:739: ye guṇāḥ samavāpyante kas tan bhūyo na 'bhidhāsyati /10/
T08suvrnavu:749: kathaṃ na viduṣāṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛdayan na vidīryate /15/
T08suvrnavu:753: yayā tvayy api nāmādya pakṣapāto na darśitaḥ /17/
T08suvrnavu:758: nirvṛte tvayi ko me 'dya putraratnam anāgasaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:760: trātari tvayy anāthānāṃ gate tu paramāṅ gatim /
T08suvrnavu:761: hā jātaḥ sāṃpratam ahaṃ nirāśaḥ sutajīvite /21/
T08suvrnavu:762: adya me tat suvihitaṃ yat tvayoktaṃ mahātmane /
T08suvrnavu:763: sarvaiḥ priyair vinābhāvo bhavatīty uttamaṃ vaca iti /22/
T08suvrnavu:765: [46] sa evam bahuvidha paridevya tam upāsakam uvāca /
T08suvrnavu:766: bhoḥ kaścin mahāśrāvako 'pi tāvat tasya bhagavato 'vaśiṣyate /
T08suvrnavu:767: kasya bhagavān śāsanam anuparīkṣya parinirvṛta iti /
T08suvrnavu:768: tatas tenopāsakenoktaṃ sārthavāha śrūyate bhagavān sthaviramahākāśyapasya śāsanam anuparīkṣya parinirvṛtaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:769: sthaviramahākāśyapo 'pi bhagavadājñayaiva sthavirānandasya śāsanam anuparīndya parinirvṛtaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:771: sa idānīṃ tathāgata iva kāruṇyāt tāṃs tān grāmanagaranigamapallīpattanādīn gatvā vineyaṃ janānugrahaṃ karoti /
T08suvrnavu:775: tathā kleśavyādhigrastānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmadeśanābhaiṣajyapradānena vicikitsaṃ karoti suvaidyavat /
T08suvrnavu:776: kleśāndhakārāvaṣṭabdhānāṃ sattvānāṃ saddharmdeśanāraśminikareṇa kleśāndhakāraṃ vidhamayati sūryavat /
T08suvrnavu:784: adāntān sattvān damayaty amuktān mocayaty anāśvastān āśvasayaty aparinirvṛtān parinirvāpayati /
T08suvrnavu:788: samarthaḥ sa te 'dya sutam asmāt saṅkaṭāt parimocayatum iti /
T08suvrnavu:790: [47] tac chrutvā divākaraḥ sārthavāho gatapratyāgataprāṇa iva sasaṃbhramas tam upāsakam uvāca /
T08suvrnavu:792: tenoktaṃ sārthavāha śrutaṃ mayā sthavirānanda etarhi vaiśālyām viharaty āmrapālīvana iti /
T08suvrnavu:793: atha divākaraḥ sārthavāhaḥ sahasaivotthāya jānumaṇḍale pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena
T08suvrnavu:798: nirvṛto bhagavān buddhaḥ śiṣyāś cāsya maharddhikāḥ /
T08suvrnavu:799: avaśiṣṭas tvam eko hi teṣāṃ śāsanavardhanaḥ /2/
T08suvrnavu:802: tad adyaivaṃvidhe nāthe tiṣṭhaty ārakṣake tvayi /
T08suvrnavu:804: na bhaved yadi sattvārtho na tiṣṭheyur bhavadvidhāḥ /
T08suvrnavu:805: ghātyamānaṃ janaṃ śrāddham evaṃ katham upekṣase /5/
T08suvrnavu:806: sattvārthañ cec charīraṃ hi tvaṃ dhārayasi suvrata /
T08suvrnavu:807: tat kṛpāṃ sammukhīkṛtya samanvāhara me sutaṃ /6/
T08suvrnavu:810: kam vā vijñapayāmy anyaṃ ko 'nyo 'py evaṃ jagaddhite /
T08suvrnavu:811: nirdiṣṭaḥ śākyamuninā yathā tvam adhunā prabho /8/
T08suvrnavu:812: tvadṛte putrakasyānyas trātā nāsti vibho yataḥ /
T08suvrnavu:813: tasmāt tvaritam āgamya putram me trātum arhasi /9/
T08suvrnavu:817: [48] athaitasminn antare sthavirānandaḥ karuṇayāpūryyamāṇaś cintayaṃs trirātrestridivasasya śrāvakacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayati /
T08suvrnavu:818: ko hīyate ko varddhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṅkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ sambādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ kṛcchrasaṅkaṭasambādhaprāptaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:820: kam aham apāyamārgād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:822: kam āryadhanavirahitaṃ āryadhanaiśvaryādhipatye pratiṣṭhāpayeyam ity adrākṣīt sthavirānandaḥ
T08suvrnavu:824: kṛcchrasaṅkaṭasambādhaprāptaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā punas tatrastha eva ṛddhyā gajabhujasadṛśam
T08suvrnavu:825: bāhum abhiprasārya sahasaiva rājānam ajātaśatrum upariprāsādatalagatam atipramattavihāriṇam
T08suvrnavu:827: mahārāja na śobhanaṃ te kṛtaṃ yata suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāraḥ svayam eva na vicāritas tathādyaiṣa na sāṃpratam atrāpy anapakārī rājagṛhān niṣkāśya mahāśmaśānaṃ nīyate praghātayituṃ /
T08suvrnavu:828: nivārayety athaitat sthavirānandavacanam upaśrutya rājā sasambhramaṃ tvaritam abhinamya
T08suvrnavu:829: sthaviranandam uparidhavalagṛhastha utthāya mahatā svareṇa caturdiśam uktaṃ bhoḥ
T08suvrnavu:830: śrūyatāṃ yo mahāśmāśānaṃ tvarita mabhigamyāsmadvacanāt suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāraṃ ghātyamānaṃ
T08suvrnavu:831: pratimocayati tasyāhaṃ suvarṇapeṭakamanu prayacchāmi pañca ca grāmavarāṇi /
T08suvrnavu:833: tad rājño vacanam upaśrutya prāṇisahasrāṇi pradhāvitāni //
T08suvrnavu:835: [49] athaitasminn antare vadhyaghātakās tai rājapuruṣair adhiṣṭhitāḥ suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāram ādāya mahāśmaśānam anuprāptāḥ /
T08suvrnavu:836: kāśisundarī dārikā svakair jñātibhir nīlapītalokahitāvadātair vastraiḥ samalaṅkṛtāyāṃ
T08suvrnavu:837: śivikāyām āropya mahāśmaśānam abhinirhṛtā tasyā jñātayas tām ekasmin pradeśe sthāpayitvā
T08suvrnavu:840: etāvad eṣā yuṣmābhiś citāyām āropayitavyā muhūrtaṃ tāvad udīkṣadhvaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:841: yāvad vayaṃ suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāraṃ śūle protaṃ kṛtvā praghātayāmo yat kāraṇam eṣa
T08suvrnavu:842: suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāro 'nayā kāśisundaryā dārikayā saha ekāṃ citām āropya dhyāpayitavya
T08suvrnavu:843: ity uktvā śūlaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitum ārabdhāḥ //
T08suvrnavu:845: [50] atha suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāraḥ śūlaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya mānam ālokya mātaram anusmṛtya tīvramanyudravīkṛtasantāno 'śrūṇi prapātayitum ārabdhaḥ
T08suvrnavu:846: sāṃprataṃ mātur madviyogaṃ śrutvā kā 'vasthā bhaviṣyati /
T08suvrnavu:847: yā hi nāma pūrvaṃ yāmārddhamātram api mām apaśyantī parāpīḍāpraveditavatī sā mayādyaikaputreṇa viyuktā kathaṃ prāṇān dhārayiṣyati /
T08suvrnavu:848: hā kaṣṭam īdṛśo 'py aham evam adhanyo yan mām āgamya mātā madviyogaduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti /
T08suvrnavu:849: tatas tair vadhyaghātakaiḥ tat śūlaṃ pṛthivyāṃ nikhātaṃ paraparāṅ ca saṅjalpaṅ kartum ārabdhaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:851: tatra caikaiko 'pi vyājaṃ kartum ārabdho yūyam āropayata /
T08suvrnavu:853: mama pṛṣṭhaśūlam mama pārśvaśūlam iti na teṣāṃ kaścid utsahate sma tad akāryaṅ kartuṃ //
T08suvrnavu:855: [51] tataḥ suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāras teṣāṃ sañjarupaṃ śrutvā śūlañ ca pṛthivyāṃ nikhātam udvīkṣya hā sāmpratam ahaṃ na bhaviṣyāmīti /
T08suvrnavu:856: saṃsāra doṣodvigno mokṣamārggābhilāṣī nirānandamātmānamavagamya param abhayaviṣāda vihvalekṣaṇo vikroṣṭum ārabdhaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:857: hā kaṣṭam idānīṃ mayā sudurllabhaṃ saddharmamahotsavaṃ manuṣyatvam āsādyākṛtārthe naiva marttavyam bhaviṣyatīti /
T08suvrnavu:859: punar api mayā saṃsāracārake vastavyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
T08suvrnavu:866: punar api mayā satataṃ kṣuttṛṣṇādimahadduḥkhadaurmanasyaparīteṣu nirnaṣṭapānabhojanaśabdeṣu mūtrapurīṣakheṭasiṃhāṇakādyāhāreṣu galagaṇḍakādiṣu preteṣūpapattavyam bhaviṣyati //
T08suvrnavu:868: [52] śrūyate ca kadācit karhicit tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhā loka utpadyante /
T08suvrnavu:869: tad yathodumbare puṣpaṃ kadācit karhicit tathāgatapraveditasya dharmavinayasya lokeṣu darśanārthaṃ prajñāyate /
T08suvrnavu:870: durllabhā kṣaṇasampad durllabham manuṣyatvam āryāyatane pratyājātir indrayair vikalatā
T08suvrnavu:873: tad idam aṣṭākṣaṇavinirmuktam me manuṣyatvaṃ viphalī bhaviṣyati /
T08suvrnavu:875: kiṃ bhagavān mahākāruṇiko buddhas tiṣṭhati yaṃ samanusmārāmi yo mām āsyām avasthāyām
T08suvrnavu:876: anātham atrāṇam aśaraṇaṃ aparāyaṇaṃ nirālokaṃ kṛcchrasaṅkaṭasambādhaprāptaṃ mahākāruṇikatvād
T08suvrnavu:878: sa ca bhagavān mama bhāgyāparādhena laghu laghu eva parinirvṛtaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:879: tat kim idānīm asyām avasthāyāṃ samanusmarāmi /
T08suvrnavu:880: ko me tathāgata iva kāruṇyād āgatya paritrāṇaṅ kariṣyatīti /
T08suvrnavu:883: [53] tasya buddhir utpannā sthavirānando mahātmā tiṣṭhati /
T08suvrnavu:886: tasya bhagavatā sthavirmahākāśyapena ca sakalaṃ śāsanam anuparīnditaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:887: tenādhunāvalokyāvalokya sarvasattvahitaṃ karaṇīyaṃ mahārddhikaś cāsau mahānubhāvaḥ
T08suvrnavu:888: samarthaś ca sthavirānando mām asmād vyasanāt paritrātuṃ tam eva samanusmarāmīti
T08suvrnavu:893: sthavirānanda vijñaptiṃ tvam idānīṃ śrotum arhasi /1/
T08suvrnavu:895: ayi nirvṛtim āyātaḥ kāśyape tu mahātmani /2/
T08suvrnavu:897: tvayy eva bhāraṃ nikṣipya jagato 'sya vibhūtaye /3/
T08suvrnavu:903: agrayas tvaṃ buddhaśiṣyāṇāṃ tvañ ca śāsanadhūrddharaḥ /6/
T08suvrnavu:904: tvam adya duḥkhapātālād yadi māṃ noddhariṣyasi /
T08suvrnavu:905: hato 'smi yasmād dheto 'nyaṃ nāthaṃ nānavaimi sāṃprataṃ /7/
T08suvrnavu:906: na bibhemi tathā mṛtyor jātasya maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:909: akṛtārthena martavyam iti me mahatī vyathā /9/
T08suvrnavu:911: tvām āgamya yathā nīti vandhyatām me tathā kuru /10/
T08suvrnavu:916: tad evam aparitrāṇaṃ vīkṣya divyena cakṣuṣā /
T08suvrnavu:917: tvam adya kṣipram āgamya māṃ paritrātum arhasī ty /13/
T08suvrnavu:921: cakṣuṣā suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāram asyām avasthāyāṃ varttamānam ālokya karuṇayā sañcodyamānacittavṛttirdivyenāvabhāsena
T08suvrnavu:922: bhuvanamaṇḍalam avabhāsya pañcārhacchataparivāraḥ sahasaiva ṛddhyā nabhastalam sandhyābhrapaṭalair
T08suvrnavu:923: iva gaganatalam āpūrayan sakalabhuvanalakṣmīpuñja iva dedīpyamānavigrahaḥ śmaśānābhimukhaḥ saṃprasthitaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:925: sthavirānandaṃ mahatābhikṣusaṃghena sārddham arddhacandrākāropagūḍham upari vihāyasā
T08suvrnavu:926: ṛddhyā sandhyābhrapaṭalair iva gaganatalam alaṅkṛtya mahāśmaśāṇābhimukham āgacchantaṃ
T08suvrnavu:927: dṛṣṭvā ca punar asyābhavan niyataṃ sthavirānandaḥ suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāram uddiśyāgatas
T08suvrnavu:928: tañ cāgamya mahad āścaryādbhutan dharmaṃ deśayitukāmo bhaviṣyatīti /
T08suvrnavu:930: tataś ca sahasaiva sthavirānandaṃ saparivāraṃ namaskṛtya śaraṇapṛṣṭhāt tvaritatvaritam avatīrya padabhyām eva naika prāṇiśatasahasraparivāro mahāśmaśānaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:931: asmiṃś cānantare vadhyaghātakās tai rājapuruṣair udyatā śastrais tarjitāḥ kim artham eva vilambadhvaṃ śīghram enaṃ kumāraṃ śūle samāropayateti
T08suvrnavu:932: tatas te vaghyaghātakāḥ saṃtrastāḥ suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāraṃ śūle samāropayāmaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:934: suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāraḥ saṃsāradoṣodvignacetā nirāśībhūto vikroṣṭum ārabdhaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:935: hā kaṣṭam āryānandenāhaṃ parityakto yan nāma samanvākṛtya na paritrāta ity //
T08suvrnavu:937: [55] athāsminn antare sthavirānando mahātmā dūrata evāgacchan vyāpinā svareṇa diśaḥ sarvvāḥ samāpūrayan suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāraṃ samāśvāsayann uvāca /
T08suvrnavu:938: mā bhair vatsa yuṣmadvidhānam eva vineyānām arthe imam āśīviṣaprakhyaṃ kāyam aham
T08suvrnavu:939: dhārayāmīti tad vatsa mā bhair ahaṃ tvām adyāsmāt saṃṅkaṭāt parimocayiṣyāmi adya
T08suvrnavu:941: adya yat tena bhagavatā jānatā paśyatā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksambuddhena sthaviramahākāśyapena ca śāsanam api vinyas taṃ tat saphalī kariṣyāmi
T08suvrnavu:944: adya tavedam maraṇabhayaṃ saṃsārikañ ca bhayam apanayāmi /
T08suvrnavu:946: adya te kudarśanapaṭalāvaṣṭabdhe netre jñānāñjanaśalākayā śodhyāmi /
T08suvrnavu:955: adya te haṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yathā tvam anantakoṭiniyutaśatasahasradurllabhataram aśeṣakleśopakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ prāpsyasi /
T08suvrnavu:958: adya tvaṃ vatsa sahasā janmavṛkṣañ cirāyituṃ /
T08suvrnavu:961: vīrya plavaṃ samāruhya tvam adya pratariṣyasi /3/
T08suvrnavu:964: kalpakoṭisahasreṣu yan na labdhaṃ tvayā padaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:965: tad vatsa durlabhataraṃ prāpsyasy adya nirāsravam iti /5/
T08suvrnavu:967: [56] athaitat sthavirānandād upaśruta suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāro gatapratyāgataprāṇa ivāśvasitaḥ saṃhṛṣitatanuruho gaganatalāsaktadṛṣṭiḥ sthavirānandāvarjitaikamanaso 'bhavat /
T08suvrnavu:968: tatas tai rājapuruṣais te vadhyaghātakā uktāḥ /
T08suvrnavu:970: kāruṇikā ete kadācid āgatya vighnaṃ kurvanti /
T08suvrnavu:972: mā vo rājaśāsanātikramān mahān anartho bhaviṣyatīti /
T08suvrnavu:973: tatas te vadhyaghātakāḥ putradārasvajanabandhujīvitavināśabhayabhītāḥ suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāram utkṣipya śūle pratiṣṭhāpayitum ārabdhāḥ /
T08suvrnavu:974: tataḥ sthavirānandena sahasaiva tathādhiṣṭhitaṃ yathā tasya śūlasyopari candramaṇḍalapratisparddhi vistīrṇakarṇiakam mahāpramāṇaṃ padmaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ
T08suvrnavu:975: tasya ca padmasyopari karṇikāyāṃ suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāraḥ praryaṅkeṇa niṣannaḥ tañ ca
T08suvrnavu:976: padmakarṇikāyām upari paryaṅkena niṣannam udvīkṣya gaganatalagatair anekair devatāniyutaśatasahasrair hāhākāro muktaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:992: iva bhāskaraḥ sakalabhuvanalakṣmīpuñja iva dedīpyamānamūrttiḥ svatejasā sūryaprabhān
T08suvrnavu:993: nirbhartsayaṃś pañcārhacchataparivāraḥ samanuprāpto gagatalastha eva suvarṇavarṇaṃ
T08suvrnavu:1002: jñānena hatvā hy ajñānaṃ nāgacchanti punarbhavam ity /3/
T08suvrnavu:1004: [58] athāsya vacanasya samanantaram eva suvarṇavarṇena kumāreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāmadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphala sākṣāt kṛtaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:1005: atha suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāro vaṇig iva labdhalābhaḥ sasyasampanna iva karṣakaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1006: śūra iva vijitasaṃgrāmaś cakravartirājyapratilambhād iva paramaprītiprāmodyajātaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1007: tatrastha eva kṛtakarapuṭaḥ sthavirānandaṃ pratiṣṭotum ārabdhaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1008: namas te sthavirānanda namas te sthavirottama /
T08suvrnavu:1010: aho te karuṇā sphītā aho kāruṇyam uttamaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:1012: lokanātha iti sthāne śabdas te visṛto bhuvi /
T08suvrnavu:1013: bhayārtto yad anātho 'haṃ tvayā nāthena mocitaḥ /3/
T08suvrnavu:1016: tat kṛtaṃ na ca me mātrā na pitrā nāpi bāndhavaiḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1017: kalyāṇamitram āgamya tvām ahaṃ yad avāptavān /5/
T08suvrnavu:1021: dhiyā samena guṇitaḥ paryante sthāpitas tvayā /7/
T08suvrnavu:1023: bhiṣagvaram iha prāpya sukhajāto 'smi nirjvara iti /8/
T08suvrnavu:1025: [59] tato devatābhiḥ sthavirānandasya mānasam avalokya tatkṣaṇād eva mahāśmaśānam
T08suvrnavu:1028: atiramaṇīyaṃ devānām iva nandanodyānaṃ tatra ca sthavirānandasyārthe nānāratnavinyāsavicitritabhaktiprakāraracitaṃ
T08suvrnavu:1029: divyaṃ sarvasauvarṇaṃ sapādapīṭhaṃ mahat siṃhāsanaṃ prajñaptaṃ teṣām api pañcānām
T08suvrnavu:1031: tataḥ sthavirānando gagatalād avatīrya siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1032: tāny api pañcārhacchatāny avatīrya prajñapteṣv āsaneṣu niṣaṇṇāni //
T08suvrnavu:1034: [60] rājā cājātaśatrur anekaprāṇiśatasahasraparivāraḥ samanuprāpto yāvat paśyati
T08suvrnavu:1035: tām vibhūtiṃ suvarṇavarṇañ ca kumāraṃ candramaṇḍalapratisparddhinaṃ padmasyopari
T08suvrnavu:1036: karṇikāyāṃ niṣaṇṇaṃ ghanapaṭalanirmuktam iva śaratakālapūrṇacandraṃ suvarṇayūpam
T08suvrnavu:1039: sarvaśarīreṇa sthavirānandasya pādayoḥ patitaḥ tataś ca mukhatuṇḍakena caraṇāv anuparimārjyotthāyobhe
T08suvrnavu:1040: jānumaṇḍale pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya kṛtakarapuṭaḥ sthavirānandam udvīkṣamāṇa uvāca /
T08suvrnavu:1043: na samanvāhṛtaś cet syād ahañ cāyañ ca te janaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1045: yaditvan na bhaves trātā samāsattva hito muniḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1046: aham adyaiva dagdhaḥ syāṃ paścāt tāpadavāgnimā /3/
T08suvrnavu:1047: aho jñānamahatvan te karuṇā ceyam uttamā /
T08suvrnavu:1048: adbhutañ cāritaṃ cedam aho samyak prakāśitaṃ /4/
T08suvrnavu:1050: praśāntim paramāṃ yāto manye naivaṃ tathāgataḥ /5/
T08suvrnavu:1051: kṛcchraprāptasya lokasya tvan nāthas tvaṃ parāyaṇaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:1053: bhagavantaṃ samālokya yā me prītir abhūt purā /
T08suvrnavu:1054: sa evādya tvāṃ samālokya jinaśāsanadhūrdharam iti /7/
T08suvrnavu:1056: [61] atha sa rājā sthavirānandanam evam abhistutya samutthāya ca paramapraharṣapūrṇamanās
T08suvrnavu:1057: tvaritatvaritaṃ śūlasamīpam upagamya tato hastau prasārya suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāraṃ priyaputram
T08suvrnavu:1058: iva naṣṭopalabdhaṃ pareṇa premṇā svayam eva tasmāt padmāsanād avatārya gāḍhaṃ pariṣvajya
T08suvrnavu:1060: harṣāśruparyākulekṣaṇaś ca suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāram animiṣam abhivīkṣamāṇa uvāca /
T08suvrnavu:1061: rājyalābhād iva purā na sā prītir abhūn mama
T08suvrnavu:1062: muktaṃ tvāṃ saṅkaṭād asmād dṛṣṭvā yā varddhate 'dhunā /1/
T08suvrnavu:1064: mukhābujam idaṃ putra diṣṭyā paśyāmi te 'dhunā /2/
T08suvrnavu:1068: vadhāyāsi parityakto yena tvaṃ vallabho nṛṇāṃ /4/
T08suvrnavu:1070: rūpam atyadbhutañ cedaṃ vada kasya na vallabhaṃ /5/
T08suvrnavu:1071: guṇeṣu kasya pradveṣaḥ ko doṣānuguṇaḥ sadā /
T08suvrnavu:1074: vyāhṛtaṃ hṛdayaṃ tasya tvaṃ putraka na vallabhaḥ /7/
T08suvrnavu:1075: pradīptam vajram ārabdhaṃ prakṣeptum mama mastake /
T08suvrnavu:1076: kaṇṭhe vā niśitaṃ śastraṃ śaktiṃ vakṣyasi vā dhṛḍhāṃ /8/
T08suvrnavu:1077: prapātayitum ārabdhaḥ kena me hy ayaśo 'śaniḥ //
T08suvrnavu:1079: hā kena dāruṇañ vācā karmedaṃ tava kāritaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:1080: ko me vairānubaddhaḥ syāt kasyāhaṃ na priyo bhaveta /10/
T08suvrnavu:1081: mṛtyunāliṅgitaḥ ko 'sau prāṇāḥ kasya na vallabhāḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1082: yena te vadha ājñaptaḥ śīghram ākhyātum arhasīti /11/
T08suvrnavu:1085: sa ced asya rājña evaṃ kathayāmi pracaṇḍenāmātyena mamedaṃ karma kāritam iti /
T08suvrnavu:1087: yataḥ sāṃpratam eva pracaṇḍam amātyaṃ praghātayati /
T08suvrnavu:1090: dhruvañ ca mayā pūrvveṣu janmāntareṣu pāpakam akuśalaṃ karma kṛtaṃ yasyāyaṃ vipāko
T08suvrnavu:1091: na ca pūrvakarmavipākaṃ muktvā evam anāgaso vadhāya parityajyata iti niścayam upagamya rājānam uvāca /
T08suvrnavu:1092: mayaivaṃ tat kṛtaṃ karma pāpakaṃ pūrvajanmasu /
T08suvrnavu:1094: tad aniṣṭañ ca nāmādya svakānām eva karmaṇāṃ /
T08suvrnavu:1095: vipākaṃ paribhuñjāno py ādekṣyāmi kam nv ahaṃ /2/
T08suvrnavu:1096: ity uktvā sthavirānandasamīpam upagamya sarvaśarīreṇa sthavirānandasya pādayor nipatitaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1097: sthavirānandena cokto vatsa eṣā kāśisundarī dārikā viṣavegenāvaṣṭabdhā tad uttiṣṭhaināṃ satyādhiṣṭhānena svasthī kuru mahājanakāyaś ca pratyāyya iti /
T08suvrnavu:1099: [63] atha suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāraḥ sthavirānandasya pratiśrutya sarvasattvādhyāśayapravṛttena cetasā satyādhiṣṭhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1100: yena me satyena satyavacanenāsyāḥ kāśisundaryā dārikāyā antike mana sūkṣmo 'pi kleśo
T08suvrnavu:1101: notpanno rāgo vā dveṣo vā moho vā vihiṃsā vānyatam anyatamo vā caitasika upakleśo
T08suvrnavu:1102: 'nena satyena satyavacanena cāsyāḥ śarīraviṣamvilayam upagacchatv ity athaitasmin
T08suvrnavu:1103: satyādhiṣṭhānasamanantaram eva kāśisundarīdārikāyāḥ śarīrād viṣaṃ vilayam upagataṃ
T08suvrnavu:1105: tāṃ svasthībhūtaśarīrām utthitām ālokya tena mahājanakāyenānekaiś ca devatāśatasahastrair ekaravenoccair nādo muktaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1107: maharddhiko 'yaṃ kumāro mahānubhāvo yatredānīṃ satyādhiṣṭhānabalād iyam anena kāśisundarī dārikā samutthāpitā priyeṇa jīvitenācchāditeti /
T08suvrnavu:1108: tataḥ kāśisundarī dārikā samantān nirīkṣitum ārabdhā yāvat paśyati mahāśmaśāne sthavirānandaṃ mahatā bhikṣusaṅghena sārddham arddhacandrākāropagūḍhaṃ
T08suvrnavu:1109: nānāratnapradyotite divye mahati siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaṃ rājāmaṃ ajātaśatrum anekaprāṇiśatasahasraparivāram
T08suvrnavu:1110: ātmānañ ca nīlapītalohitāvadātāyāṃ śivikāyām āropitaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ sambhrāntā
T08suvrnavu:1112: kim ayaṃ svapnam āho svic cittavibhramaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1113: atha vā kenacid etan māyākarmavidarśitaṃ bhavatīti /
T08suvrnavu:1114: yāvat tasyā jñātibhir etad vistareṇa samākhyātaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:1115: uktā ca sarvathā yad etat tava jīvitaṃ tat sarvaṃ sthavirānandam āgamyeti
T08suvrnavu:1117: [64] tac chrutvā kāśisundarī dārikā sthavirānande samupajātabahumānā paraṃ prasādaṃ pravedayitum ārabdhā /
T08suvrnavu:1118: atha kāśisundarī dārikā udyānaṃ samanusmṛtya pracaṇḍañ cāmātyaṃ udvignamanasā maraṇabhayaviṣādavihvalekṣaṇāvasthān tām eva parāṃ pravedayantī strībhāvam anuśocitum ārabdhā /
T08suvrnavu:1120: yad āgamy āham imām avasthām anuprāpteti samvignamānasā tvaritam utthāyaikañ ca vastram
T08suvrnavu:1121: ādāya sthavirānandasamīpam upagamya tad ekaṃ vastraṃ sthavirānandāya niryātya pādayor
T08suvrnavu:1122: nipatya tīvrena prasādavegena sthavirānandaguṇānusmaraṇapūrvvakaṃ satyādhiṣṭhānaṃ kartum ārabdhā //
T08suvrnavu:1124: sarveṣāṃ buddhaśiṣyāṇām agraprāpto 'tiśreṣṭho viśiṣṭaḥ pravara uttaro 'nuttaraḥ śrāvakanāgaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1141: samyagājñāsuvimuktacitto maharddhiko mahānubhāvo mahādakṣiṇīyo 'nena satyena satyavacanenādyaiva
T08suvrnavu:1143: athaitat satyādhiṣṭhānasamanantaram eva tasyāḥ strīndriyam antarhitaṃ puruṣendriyaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:1144: puruṣo babhūva atirupo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko vicitravastrālaṅkṛtaśarīro gaganatalāc cāsyā divyanvicitraṃ manoramaṃ vastravaryam patitum ārabdhaṃ
T08suvrnavu:1145: apīdānīṃ vastravaryeṇa patatā tathā gaganamaṇḍalaṃ saṃcchannaṃ yadā tasmin muhurte tasmin mahāśmaśāne sūryaraśmayo na prajñāyante sma /
T08suvrnavu:1146: tatas tad atyadbhutaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ sthavirānandasyaguṇamāhātmyaṃ dṛṣṭvā gaganatalagatair anekair devatākoṭiniyutaśatasahastrair hāhākāro muktaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1150: aho suviśuddhaṃ dakṣiṇīyaṃ kṣetraṃ yatra hi nāmaikavastrapradānamātreṇa praṇidhānasamanantaram eva kāśisundarīdārikāyāḥ strīndriyam antarhitaṃ
T08suvrnavu:1152: tatas tābhir devatābhiḥ prasannamanaskābhir divyaṃ puṣpavarṣaṃ pātitaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:1156: ātmano yathābhilaṣitaṃ sadyo vipākaphalam udvīkṣya paramavismayāvarjitacittasantatiḥ
T08suvrnavu:1158: upanikṣipya bhūmau kṛtakarapuṭaḥ sthavirānandam abhiṣṭotum ārabdhaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1160: yenādyaivam anāthusya dattam ye jīvitaṃ tvayā /1/
T08suvrnavu:1161: yadi tvan na bhaves trātā viśuddhajñānalocanaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1162: kathaṃ prāṇavaśiṣṭaṃ syāṃ tvam me prāṇaprado mune /2/
T08suvrnavu:1164: yad evaṃ saṅkaṭād ghorāt paritrātas tvayā janaḥ /3/
T08suvrnavu:1168: yathābhilaṣitaṃ prāptam adya phalam idaṃ śubhaṃ /5/
T08suvrnavu:1169: ādhāram iva yan manye doṣāṇām mahatām api /
T08suvrnavu:1170: tat strītvaṃ tyaktam adyaiva puṃstvaṃ cādhigataṃ mayā /6/
T08suvrnavu:1173: evaṃ guṇini sukṣetre ye vai kārān na kurvate /
T08suvrnavu:1174: adhanyā vañcitās te mohādyaiḥ kleśaśatrubhir iti /8/
T08suvrnavu:1176: [66] sa eva sthavirānandam abhiṣṭutya karmaphalapratyakṣadarśī cintayām āsa /
T08suvrnavu:1177: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad aham iṣṭāniṣṭakarmaphalapratyakṣadarśī punar apy āgāram adhyāvaseyam iti //
T08suvrnavu:1179: labheyāham ārya svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvañ careyam ahaṃ sthavirasyāntike brahmacaryam iti /
T08suvrnavu:1180: sa sthavirānandena pravrājitas tathā ca samanuśiṣṭo yathā yāvat sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:1182: [67]athāsminn antare divākaraḥ sārthavāhaḥ sapatnīko 'pi putraviyogaśokaduḥkhābhyāhato rājagṛhasya nagarasya madhye śṛṅgāṭakasya pṛthivyām utthāyotthāyātmānaṃ pātayati /
T08suvrnavu:1185: hā putra hā putreti cārttasvaraṃ virauti sma /
T08suvrnavu:1186: aśrauṣīd divākaraḥ sārthavāhaḥ sthavirānandena gaganatalenāgatya suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāraḥ paritrāto mahāśmaśāne āścaryā bhūtāni vartanta iti /
T08suvrnavu:1187: śrutvā ca punaḥ sapatniko 'py amṛtā cābhiṣekābhisikta iva paramānanditamanāś cakravarttirājyābhiṣekābhiṣikta
T08suvrnavu:1188: iva paramaprītiprāmodyajātaḥ sahasaivotthāya tvaritagatipracārayā rājagṛhān nagarān
T08suvrnavu:1189: nirggatya mahāśmaśānam anuprāpto yāvat paśyati suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāraṃ rāhugrastavinirmuktaṃ
T08suvrnavu:1190: śaratakālapūrṇacandraṃ sthavirānandasamīpe niṣaṇṇaṃ tāñ ca sthavirānandaguṇasāmarthyajanitāṃ
T08suvrnavu:1191: vibhūtiṃ tatas tasya tad atyadbhutaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthavirānande
T08suvrnavu:1192: samupajātabahumānaḥ paramaprasādavegāvarjitacittasantānaḥ sarvaśarīreṇa sthavirānandasya pādayoḥ patitaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1193: utthāya cobhe jānumaṇḍale pṛthivyām upanikṣipya harṣād aśrūrmibhir āpūryamāṇavadanakamalaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1196: yan mahāsaṅkaṭād ghorāt paritrātas tvayā janaḥ /1/
T08suvrnavu:1201: yadi vāyaṃ tvayādyaiva na samanvāhṛto bhavet /
T08suvrnavu:1202: nimagno duḥkhajambāle sapatnīko hy ahañ ciraṃ /4/
T08suvrnavu:1207: na lagnaḥ śokapaṅke 'dya na kṣataḥ śokakaṇṭakaiḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1208: na daṣṭaḥ śokasarpeṇa na viddhaḥ śokasāyakaiḥ /7/
T08suvrnavu:1209: na cchinaḥ śokanistriṅśair na prāptaḥ śokaśatrubhiḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1210: na grastaḥ śokamakarair na dagdhaḥ śokavahninā /8/
T08suvrnavu:1213: ānanda iti nāmedam aho svanvarthatāṅ gataṃ /
T08suvrnavu:1214: yenaivaṃ kurvatā trāṇaṃ paramānanditā vayam iti /10/
T08suvrnavu:1216: [68] atha divākaraḥ sārthavāhaḥ sthavirānandam abhiṣṭutyotthāya ca suvarṇavarṇasya
T08suvrnavu:1217: kumārasya samīpam upagamya sapatnīko 'pi sahagāḍhaṃ kaṇṭhe pariṣvajya muhurmuhuḥ pariṣvajate sma /
T08suvrnavu:1218: praharṣajāto 'śruparyākulekṣaṇaś ca suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāraṃ animiṣena samavalokayann uvāca /
T08suvrnavu:1220: manorathaśatair labdhaṃ diṣṭyā paśyāmi te punaḥ /1/
T08suvrnavu:1222: sthavirānandam āgamya punaḥ paśyāmi te mukham iti /2/
T08suvrnavu:1224: [69] atha suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāraḥ saṃsāradoṣodvignacetā mātāpitarāv anujñāpya sthavirānandasya pādayor nipatyovāca /
T08suvrnavu:1225: sthavira labheyāhaṃ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvañ careyam ahaṃ svākhyātadharmavinaye brahmacaryam iti /
T08suvrnavu:1226: sa sthavirānandena pravrājitas tathā ca samanuśiṣṭo yathānena tasminn eva muhūrte sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhattvaṃ prāptaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:1227: so 'rhattvaprāptaḥ pūrvaikāṃ janmaparamparām avalokitum ārabdho yāvat paśyaty ātmānam atīva puṇyamaheśākhyaṃ tasyaitad abhavat /
T08suvrnavu:1228: kṣuṇo 'haṃ sa cen mayā vijñātum abhaviṣyad ity aham eva puṇyamaheśākhya iti /
T08suvrnavu:1229: mayā yāvad āptaṃ dānāni dattāni puṇyāni kṛtāny abhaviṣyan /
T08suvrnavu:1230: tad idānīm api sattvānāṃ puṇyeṣu gauravotpādanārthaṃ svaṃ puṇyamahātmyaṃ prakāśayeyam iti /
T08suvrnavu:1231: tatas tena tāni vastrāṇi svaśarīrād avatāritāni tatsamanantaram eva cāparāṇi tādṛśāny eva prādurbhūtāni /
T08suvrnavu:1232: punaḥ punar avatārayitum ārabdhas tathaiva cāsya punaḥ punaḥ prādurbhavanti /
T08suvrnavu:1233: tenāvatāryāvatārya sthavirānandasya purastān mahān vastrarāśiḥ kṛtaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1234: tañ ca teṣām api mahārhāṇām vastrāṇāṃ rāśim abhinavoditadivākarakiraṇvicchuritam
T08suvrnavu:1235: iva jāmbunadasuvarṇarāśiṃ kanakāyamānam udvīkṣya sa mahājanakāyaḥ paramavismayāvarjitacittasantatir uvāca /
T08suvrnavu:1236: aho āścaryam aho 'dbhutam aho puṇyānāṃ māhātmyam aho sukṛtāni puṇyāni anena mahātmanā /
T08suvrnavu:1237: yatra hi nāmaivam avyavacchinnam avatārayato 'pi caiṣām atimahārhāṇāṃ paryantam api nādhigamyata iti /
T08suvrnavu:1238: tatas tena mātāpitros tāni vastrāṇi niryātitāni tābhyām api sthavirānandapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgham ādiṃ kṛtvā yāvān asau janakāyo mahāśmaśānaṃ sannipatitaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1240: suvarṇavarṇasya tu bhikṣoḥ puṇyānubhāvenāsau vastrarāśir naiva kṣīyate /
T08suvrnavu:1242: [70] tataḥ suvarṇavarṇo bhikṣur upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya ṛddhyā rājagṛhan nagaraṃ gatvā madhye śṛṅgāṭakasya suvarṇavarṇānāṃ vastrāṇāṃ svaśarīrād
T08suvrnavu:1243: tāryāvatārya mahāpramāṇaṃ rāśiṃ kṛtvā svareṇa rājagṛhan nagaram āpūrayann uvāca /
T08suvrnavu:1244: bhavanto mayaitāni vastrāṇi parityaktāni yasya vo yāvadbhiḥ prayojanaṃ sa tāvanti pratigṛhṇātv iti /
T08suvrnavu:1246: yāvat paśyanti nagaramadhye śṛṅgāṭakasya teṣāṃ suvarṇapītānāṃ vastrāṇāṃ atimahāpramāṇaṃ
T08suvrnavu:1247: rāśiṃ aruṇkiraṇaparāmṛṣṭam iva jāmbūnadasuvarṇarāśim iva milimilāyamānam āyuṣmāntaṃ
T08suvrnavu:1248: ca suvarṇavarṇam uttaptakāñcanagiriśṛṅgam iva paramayā śriyā jvalantaṃ gaganatalagatam
T08suvrnavu:1250: cintayām āsa aho āścaryam aho 'dbhutaṃ tat kiṃ punar anena mahātmanā kṛtaṃ bhaved
T08suvrnavu:1251: yenāyam evaṃ maharddhiko mahānubhāvo yadi ca vayaṃ jānīmo vayam api tat kuryāmahe
T08suvrnavu:1252: yena vayam apy evaṃ maharddhikāṃ syāma iti /
T08suvrnavu:1253: samutpannābhilāṣāḥ sandehadolāruḍhāś ca parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1254: teṣām etad abhavad eṣa eva mahātmā maharddhiko mahānubhāvaḥ siddhavrato divyajñānasamanvāgataś ca etam eva paripṛcchāma iti /
T08suvrnavu:1255: tato 'sau janakāyaḥ paramavismayotphullalocanaḥ kṛtakarapuṭo gaganatalāsaktadṛṣṭir āyuṣmantaṃ suvarṇavarṇam ekaraveṇa praṇamyovāca /
T08suvrnavu:1257: yenaivaṃ tvaṃ maheśākhyas tvaṃ samākhyātum arhasi /1/
T08suvrnavu:1258: yena prāpnoti sampattim iha loke paratra ca /
T08suvrnavu:1259: bhogānāñ ca guṇānāñ ca tān svayaṃ khyātum arhasī ti /2/
T08suvrnavu:1263: amum evārtham uddiśya mayedaṃ darśitaṃ hi vaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1265: puṇyair āpnoti sampattim iha loke paratra ca /
T08suvrnavu:1266: bhogānāñ ca guṇānāñ ca puṇyaiś cāham maharddhikaḥ /3/
T08suvrnavu:1267: yadi vo na priyaṃ duḥkhaṃ priyāś ca sukhasampadaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1268: kṣipraṃ kurudhvaṃ puṇyāni sukhaṃ puṇyasya sañcayaḥ /4/
T08suvrnavu:1269: yā kācit sukhasampattir iha loke paratra ca /
T08suvrnavu:1270: prāpyate nivṛttiś cāpi puṇyānām eva tat phalaṃ /5/
T08suvrnavu:1271: dhaninaḥ śreṣṭhino viprāḥ sārthavāhādayaś ca yān /
T08suvrnavu:1272: bhuñjate vipulān bhogān puṇyānām eva tat phalaṃ /6/
T08suvrnavu:1274: yad bhavanti manuṣyāṇāṃ puṇyānām eva tat phalaṃ /7/
T08suvrnavu:1276: labdhvā yad rājante martyāḥ puṇyānām eva tat phalaṃ /8/
T08suvrnavu:1278: labhante khalu yan martyāḥ puṇyānām eva tat phalaṃ /9/
T08suvrnavu:1280: prāpnuvanti manuṣyā yat puṇyānām eva tat phalaṃ /10/
T08suvrnavu:1282: yan martyā muñjate hṛṣṭāḥ puṇyānām eva tat phalaṃ /11/
T08suvrnavu:1284: niḥsapatnāḥ sthirāś caiva puṇyānām eva tat phalaṃ /12/
T08suvrnavu:1285: yad uttarakurau dvīpe hy amamā aparigrahāḥ
T08suvrnavu:1286: manuṣyā niyatāyuṣkāḥ puṇyānām eva eva tat phalaṃ /13/
T08suvrnavu:1288: manuṣyā bhuñjate tatra puṇyānām eva tat phalaṃ /14/
T08suvrnavu:1290: ācchādayanti manujāḥ puṇyānām eva tat phalaṃ /15/
T08suvrnavu:1291: yat tad uttarakurau dvīpe manuṣyās tad anantaraṃ /
T08suvrnavu:1292: cyutā devā bhaviṣyanti puṇyānām eva tat phalaṃ /16/
T08suvrnavu:1294: pātāle bhuñjate divyāḥ puṇyānām eva tat phalaṃ /17/
T08suvrnavu:1296: manujendrā virājante puṇyānām eva tat phalaṃ /18/
T08suvrnavu:1300: buṅkte yac cakravartī ca puṇyānām eva tat phalaṃ /20/
T08suvrnavu:1301: tridaśendra samāṃ lakṣmīṃ prāpya yat paribhuṅkte /
T08suvrnavu:1302: vemacitrādayo daityāḥ puṇyānām eva tat phalaṃ /21/
T08suvrnavu:1304: bhuñjate muditāś citrāṃ puṇyānām eva tat phalaṃ /22/
T08suvrnavu:1306: yat sārddhaṃ devakanyābhiḥ puṇyānām eva tat phalaṃ /23/
T08suvrnavu:1308: yat sadā mudito bhuṅkte puṇyānām eva tatphalam /24/
T08suvrnavu:1310: vimānavāsino devāḥ puṇyānām eva tat phalaṃ /25/
T08suvrnavu:1312: devebhyo 'py adhikā devā puṇyānām eva tat phalaṃ /26/
T08suvrnavu:1314: kāmadhātvīśvaro bhuṅkte puṇyānām eva tat phalaṃ /27/
T08suvrnavu:1316: labhante yad ayatnena puṇyānām eva tat phalaṃ /28/
T08suvrnavu:1318: prāpnuvanty uttamaṃ saukhyaṃ puṇyānām eva tat phalaṃ /29/
T08suvrnavu:1319: dhyāyino dhyānajaṃ yac ca tṛṣṇākṣayasukhañ ca yat /
T08suvrnavu:1320: prāpnuvanti sukhaṃ śāntiṃ puṇyānām eva tat phalaṃ /30/
T08suvrnavu:1322: maharddhikā mahātmānaḥ puṇyānām eva tat phalaṃ /31/
T08suvrnavu:1324: bodhiṃ pratyekasambuddhāḥ puṇyānām eva tat phalaṃ /32/
T08suvrnavu:1326: bhavanti samyaksambuddhāḥ puṇyānām eva tat phalaṃ /33/
T08suvrnavu:1328: striyaḥ puṇyair avāpyante puṇyānām eva tat phalaṃ /34/
T08suvrnavu:1329: puṇyair avāpyate svargaḥ puṇyasya apsarasaḥ phalaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:1331: puṇyair avāpyate tīkṣṇā tathā ca vimalā matiḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1332: puṇyair āyatanaiḥ śraddhāḥ puṇyaiḥ paṭutarā smṛtiḥ /36/
T08suvrnavu:1335: na tad asti sukhaṃ loke yat puṇyair nādhigamyate /
T08suvrnavu:1337: svalpaṃ puṇyaṃ mayā kṛtvā vipaśyini tathāgate /
T08suvrnavu:1352: gandho nīlotpalasyaiva tathā vāti mukhāc ca me /46/
T08suvrnavu:1354: tac ca saṃṅkalpamātreṇa mama sarvaṃ samṛdhyati /47/
T08suvrnavu:1355: pravrajyā ca mayā labdhā sākyasiṃhasya śāsane /
T08suvrnavu:1356: arhatvañ ca mayā prāptaṃ śītībhūto 'smi nirvṛtaḥ /48/
T08suvrnavu:1357: iyam me paścimā jātir mmama nāsti punarbhavaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1360: tasya nāvaimi paryantam adyāpy evaṃvidho 'pi san /50/
T08suvrnavu:1362: [72] tadatyadbhutam aparimitam acintyaṃ ca tasya sakāśāt puṇyamāhātmyaṃ śrutvānekaiḥ
T08suvrnavu:1364: api yathecchaṃ dānāni dattvā puṇyāni kṛtvā praṇidhānāni kṛtāni /
T08suvrnavu:1365: athāyuṣmān suvarṇavarṇāsya mahājanakāyasyaivam aneka prakāraṃ puṇyeṣu gauravotpādanārthañ ca puṇyamāhātmyaṃ prakāśya
T08suvrnavu:1367: [73] tata evopari vihāyasā sadyo mahāśmaśānam āgatya sthavirānandapramukham bhikṣusaṃgham anuparipāṭikayā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1368: rājñā cājātaśatruṇā śrutaṃ yathā kila pracaṇḍenāmātyenerṣyāprakṛtenodyāne kāśisundaryā dārikāyā ayañ cāyañ cānarthaḥ kṛtaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1369: suvarṇavarṇasyābhyākhyānaṃ dattvā niraparādha eva vadhāya parityakta iti /
T08suvrnavu:1370: śrutvā ca punas tīvrakrodhaparyākulekṣaṇo bhṛtyān āmantrayate bhavantaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1371: kathan nāmānena durātmanaivaṃ vyavaharttavyaṃ savarthā parityakto me pracaṇḍo 'mātya iti /
T08suvrnavu:1373: atha pracaṇḍo 'mātya etad rājño vacanam upaśrutya maraṇabhayaviṣādavihavalekṣaṇaḥ
T08suvrnavu:1374: pravepamānaḥ sarvāṅgāvayavaḥ sahasaivotthāya niṣpalāyitum ārabdho mahājanapradviṣṭo
T08suvrnavu:1375: 'sau tasyopary anekāni praṇiśatasahasrāṇi pradhāvitāni samantāc ca parivārya mahājanakāyena
T08suvrnavu:1376: gṛhīto gṛhītvā ca kharacapeṭapārṣṇiprahārādibhis taṃ tāḍayitum ārabdhāḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1377: sa tāḍyamānaḥ pragāḍhaduḥkhavedanābhyāhato vikroṣṭum ārabdhaḥ āryānanda paritrāsyasva mām anātham atrāṇam aśaraṇam aparāyaṇaṃ nirālokaṃ priyeṇa jīvitenācchādayeti //
T08suvrnavu:1379: [74] sthavirānandena cāsau mahājanakāyo 'bhihito bhavanto mainaṃ praghātayatāhaṃ rājānam ajātaśatrum anusaṃjñāpayiṣyāmīti /
T08suvrnavu:1380: tatas tena mahājanakāyenāsau sthavirānandavacanam upaśrutya pratimuktaḥ sthavirānandaś ca rājānaṃ nirīkṣitum ārabdhaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1385: samayato muñcāmi yadi svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajya sthavirānandasyaṃ yāvajjīvam upasthānaṃ karotīti /
T08suvrnavu:1387: sa ca tena janakāyena nirdayaṃ tāḍitaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1389: sthavirānandena cāyuṣmān suvarṇavarṇo 'bhihitaḥ satyādhiṣṭhānena pracaṇḍasyāmātyasya śarīrād duḥkhavedanāṃ prastambhayeti /
T08suvrnavu:1390: athāyuṣmān suvarṇavarṇaḥ sarvasattvahitādhyāśayapravṛttena cetasā satyādhiṣṭhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1391: yena satyena satyavacanenāsya pracaṇḍasyāmātyasyaivam atyantāpakāriṇo 'py antike mama sūkṣmo 'py āghāto notpannaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1392: tena satyena satyavacanenāsya śarīrād duḥkhavedanā pratipraśrabhyatām iti /
T08suvrnavu:1393: satyādhiṣṭhānasamanantaram eva pracaṇḍasyāmātyasya śarīrād duḥkhavedanā pravigatā
T08suvrnavu:1394: svasthībhūtaśarīraś ca samutthāya bhagavacchāsane samupajātabahumānaḥ sthavirānandasamīpam
T08suvrnavu:1396: labheyāhaṃ sthavirānanda svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvañ careyam ahaṃ sthavirānandasyāntike brahmacaryam iti /
T08suvrnavu:1397: sa sthavirānandena pravrājitas tathā ca svam anuśiṣṭo yathā tena tasminn eva muhūrte sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ prāptaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:1398: so 'rhatvaprāpto gaganatalam abhyudgamya vicitraiḥ prātihāryam mahājanamanānsi prahlādayan
T08suvrnavu:1399: gaganatalād avatīrya sthavirānandapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ anuparipāṭikayā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1401: [75] tatas tad atyadbhutaṃ sthavirānandasya mahātmyaṃ dṛṣṭvā sā parat sthavirānande 'tyartham abhiprasannā /
T08suvrnavu:1402: tatas tāṃ parṣadaṃ tathābhiprasannmanaskām ālokya sthavirānandena tathā vidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā yāṃ śrutvānekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasrais mahān viśeṣo 'dhigataḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1406: kaiścid yāvadbuddhanimnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbharā vyavasthitā divākareṇa ca sārthavāhena sapatnīkena satyāni dṛṣṭāni /
T08suvrnavu:1407: anekaiś ca devatāśatasahastrais tatas tābhir devatābhiḥ prasannamanasmabhiḥ divyaṃ vastravaryaṃ pātitaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:1408: divyāni ca vādyāni parāhatāni divyaiś cotpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamāndārakādyair jānumātreṇocchrena sarvaṃ mahāśmaśānaṃ vicitraiḥ puṣpair avakīrṇaṃ
T08suvrnavu:1410: [76] atha rājā 'jātaśatrus tad atyadbhutaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaprasādāvarjitacittasantāna udānam udānayām āsa /
T08suvrnavu:1411: aho āścaryam aho 'tyadbhutaṃ aho āryānandena svaguṇamāhātmyaṃ prakāśitaṃ aho tathāgataśāsanamāhātmyam
T08suvrnavu:1412: udbhāvitaṃ aho yat tena bhagavatā jānatā paśyatā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksambuddhena
T08suvrnavu:1413: sthaviramahākāśyapena cāsya śāsanaṃ vinayas taṃ tat saphalīkṛtaṃ //
T08suvrnavu:1414: aho tathāgatāditya 'staṅgate āryānandabhāskareṇa svaguṇakiraṇajālair udyotitā diśaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1415: aho tathāgataśaśiny anityatāsurendrarāhuṇā graste āryānandacandreṇa svam atimayūkhavisarair vaineyakumudavanāni prabodhitāni /
T08suvrnavu:1421: anenaivātyadbhutena svaguṇamāhātmyaṃ sāmarthyād antasattvahitasampādanena sarvajñaguṇamāhātmyaṃ prativivṛtaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:1422: aho darśitānena mahātmanā tasya bhagavato mahākāruṇikasya pratyupakārabuddhir ity //
T08suvrnavu:1425: sthavirānandasamīpam upagamya sarvaśarīreṇa sthavirānandasya pādayor nipatitaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1426: utthāya ubhe jānumaṇḍale pṛthivyām upanikṣipya prasādaromāñcakarkaśīkṛtamūrtiḥ kṛtakarapuṭaḥ sthavirānandam abhiṣṭotum ārabdhāḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1427: namas te puruṣaśreṣṭha namas te śrutaśāgarāḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1430: acintyam adbhutaṃ te 'dya kurvatā jagate hitaṃ /2/
T08suvrnavu:1431: yat tad bhagavatā cāryakāśyapena ca dhīmatā /
T08suvrnavu:1432: śāsanaṃ tvayi vinyastaṃ tad adya saphalīkṛtaṃ /3/
T08suvrnavu:1435: kiñ citraṃ yadi sambuddhaḥ sarvārthaṃ kṛtavāṃs tathā /
T08suvrnavu:1436: sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśī ca mahākaruṇiko hy asau /5/
T08suvrnavu:1437: idañ citrataraṃ manye śrāvakeṇa satā tvayā /
T08suvrnavu:1439: aho sulabdhalābho 'haṃ māgadhaś ca jano hy ayaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:1440: yeṣām evaṃ pramattānāṃ tvaṃ hitāvahitaḥ sadā /7/
T08suvrnavu:1446: yasya te śrāvako 'py evaṃ sadā sattvahitodyataḥ /10/
T08suvrnavu:1448: aśūnyam iva manyāmas tvayaināṃ janatāṃ yatheti /11/
T08suvrnavu:1450: [78] tato rājā sthavirānandaṃ papraccha sthavira kiṃ divākareṇa sārthavāhena sapatnīkena karma kṛtaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:1451: yasya karmaṇo vipākenāḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ sasaṃvṛttaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1453: kāśisundareṇa pracaṇḍena ca bhikṣuṇā kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yenāḍhyo mahādhane mahābhoge kule jāto bhagavacchāsane ca pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:1454: suvarṇavarṇena ca bhikṣuṇā kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:1455: yasya karmaṇo vipāke nādya mahādhane mahābhoge kule jātaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1460: mukhāc ca nīlotpalagandho janmani cāsya vastravaryaṃ karṇikārakusumavaryaṃ ca patitaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:1461: tāni ca vastrāṇi suvarṇavarṇāni evam atyārtha maharddhiko mahānubhāvo bhagavacchāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam iti
T08suvrnavu:1464: mahārājā ebhir eva pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu /
T08suvrnavu:1465: karmāṇi kṛtāni yāvat phalanti khalu dehināṃ //
T08suvrnavu:1467: [80] bhūtapūrvaṃ mahārāja ita ekanavate kalpe bhagavāṃ vipaśyī nāma tathāgato loka
T08suvrnavu:1468: udapādi vidyācaraṇasamampannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
T08suvrnavu:1470: sa bandhumatīṃ rājadhānīm upaniḥsṛtya viharati bandhumatīyake dāve /
T08suvrnavu:1472: [81] tena khalu samayena bandhumatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ karṇo nāma sārthavāhaḥ prativasaty
T08suvrnavu:1473: āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇapratisparddhī
T08suvrnavu:1474: bandhumatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ agrakulikas tena sadṛśāt kulāt kalatram ānītaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:1475: sa tayā sārddhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
