T08suvrnavu:1476: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasattvā samvṛtā yāvat karṇaḥ sārthavāhaḥ pañcavaṇikaśataparivāro mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ //
T08suvrnavu:1478: [82] sa ca garbho yathā vṛddhisu gacchati /
T08suvrnavu:1479: tathā karṇasya sārthavāhasya yad āvārīgataṃ kṣetragataṃ deśāntaragataṃ vārthajātaṃ tatra kiñcid agninā dagdhaṃ kiñcic caurair apahṛtaṃ kiñcit pauruṣeyā gṛhītvā niḥpalānāḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1480: yāvat sārthavāhapatnī paripūrṇe kāle prasūtā dārako jātaḥ kṛṣṇacchavir atyantavirūpo
T08suvrnavu:1481: 'ṣṭādaśabhir avalakṣaṇair dūṣitagātras tasya kāyān mukhāc ca tādṛśo 'tyantaviraso
T08suvrnavu:1482: gandhaḥ pravātum ārabdho yaṃ ghrātvā tadgṛhasthāḥ parijanāḥ paraṃ vaimukhyam upagatāḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1483: tasya dārakasya jātamātrasya tasmin gṛhe 'gniḥ prādurbhūto yena tad gṛhaṃ niravaśeṣañ ca svāpateyaṃ dagdhaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:1484: sārthavāhapatnī kathañcid dārakam ādāya tasmād gṛhān nirgatā /
T08suvrnavu:1485: yadā ca so 'gnis tad gṛhaṃ niravaśeṣañ ca svāpateyaṃ dagdhvā svayam eva nirvāṇaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1486: tadā sārthavāhapatnī tatrārddhabhagne khaṇḍāvavarake praviśya paṭārddhaṃ pṛthivyāṃ
T08suvrnavu:1487: prasārya dārakaṃ śāyitvā dīrgham uṣṇañ ca niḥśvasya karṇaṃ sārthavāham anusmṛtya rodituṃ pravṛttā /
T08suvrnavu:1488: hā kaṣṭam īdṛśo me viparyayaḥ samupasthita iti /
T08suvrnavu:1490: [83] karṇasya sārthavāhasya ye dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyās te tāṃ vipattiṃ dṛṣṭvā yāmo mā vayam api vinaṅkṣyāma iti bhītāḥ karṇasya sārthavāhasya patnīm apahāya niḥpalānāḥ /
T08suvrnavu:1492: mayā karṇasya sārthavāhasya gṛhe naikaprakārā sampad anubhūtā /
T08suvrnavu:1493: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad aham asyām avasthāyāṃ sārthavāhapatnīm anātham ekākinīṃ cchorayitvā niḥpalāyeyam iti /
T08suvrnavu:1495: tasyāś ca sārthavāhapatnyāḥ sarvan tat svāpateyam agninā dagdham ekadaivasikam api bhoktavyan nāsti /

T08suvrnavu:2052: nāsti buddhasamo boddho nāsti buddhasamo sudhīḥ /2/
T08suvrnavu:2053: nāsti buddhasamaṃ pātraṃ nāsti buddhasamaḥ sukhī /

T08suvrnavu:2068: ahan tu punar yad bhagavantaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyakasambuddham anekakalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair
T08suvrnavu:2073: tadā tādṛśaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kariṣyāmi yena sarvasattvottamo bhaviṣyāmīty āśayodgīrṇavacanāvasānasamanantaraṃ
T08suvrnavu:2074: bhagavān vipaśyī samyaksambuddhas tasya cetaso cittam ājñāya ṛddhayā gatvāgrataḥ
T08suvrnavu:2075: sthito 'drākṣīt sa bhṛtakapuruṣo vipaśyinaṃ tathāgatam asecanakadarśanam abhiruciracārucāmīkarāmaragiriśikharatararuṇavikiraṇavisaracitāntarodbhāsitabhāsurataraśarīradyutiṃ
T08suvrnavu:2076: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ paramaprītisaumanasya jāto 'timahatā prasādavegena tāṃ bhaktapuṭikām

T08suvrnavu:2080: [113] anena nātha puṇyena itaḥ prabhṛti janmanaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:2085: prāptaṃ tathāham apy eva sarvajñatvam avāpnuyāṃ /3/
T08suvrnavu:2086: nirjitas te yathā māro dharmacakraṃ pravartitaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:2089: atvān bahūṃs tathā cāhaṃ tārāye munisattama /5/
T08suvrnavu:2090: atha sa bhagavān vipaśyī samyaksasambuddhaḥ sakalajaladagambhīrodāttena svareṇoccair uvāca /
T08suvrnavu:2092: atha sa bhagavān vipaśyī samyaksasambuddhaḥ sakalajaladagambhīrodāttena svareṇoccair uvāca /
T08suvrnavu:2094: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ hi mahānubhāvaḥ sarvārthasiddho bhuvi nāma śāstā /
T08suvrnavu:2095: jitveha māraṃ sabalaṃ prasahya bhīmaṃ samantād abhiniṣpatantaṃ /6/ ity
T08suvrnavu:2097: [114] atha vipaśyī samyaksambuddhas taṃ puruṣam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau vyākṛtya prakrānto 'yañ ca vṛttānto bandhumatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ samantato niḥsṛtaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:2099: śrutvā ca punas tena svayam evāgatya tatakuśalamūlasaṃbhārotsāhitamatinā sa puruṣo
T08suvrnavu:2100: 'ti mahatā satkāreṇa hastiskandhe samāropya bhavanaṃ nītvārdhāsanaṃ niṣādyārddharājyānupradānena pūjitaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:2102: mahārāja nāhaṃ kāmair arthī tadanujānīsva māṃ pravrajya brahmacaryañ carāmīti /
T08suvrnavu:2103: sa rājñānujñātaḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitaḥ sa tatra yāvad āptabrahmacaryaṃ caritvā kālagato nirmāṇaratiṣu deveṣūprapannaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:2106: so 'pi kiñcit kālaṃ rājyaṃ kārayitvā kālagato 'mātyair mahatā satkāreṇa surūpo rājye pratiṣṭhāpitas tena ṣaṣṭhivarṣahasrāṇi dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kāritaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:2109: [115] kiṃ manyase mahārājānyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena surūpro nāma rājā 'bhūd iti /
T08suvrnavu:2111: api tv eṣa suvarṇavarṇaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena surūpo 'nāma rājābhūd yad anena
T08suvrnavu:2112: vipaśyini tathāgate haridrāraktaṃ vastrakhaṇḍam anupradataṃ praṇidhānañ ca kṛtaṃ
T08suvrnavu:2113: tasya karmaṇo vipākenānena devamanuṣyeṣv anantaṃ devyamānuṣyakaṃ sukham anubhūtaṃ
T08suvrnavu:2114: yatra yatropapadyate tatra tatra suvarṇakāyaḥ suvarṇavarṇavastrācchāditaśarīraḥ karṇikārakusumavarṣaṃ
T08suvrnavu:2116: yāvad etarhy apy evaṃ puṇyamaheśākhyo yat kāyād asakṛd apanīte vastre 'nyad vastraṃ tatkṣaṇād eva śarīre samutpadyata iti /
T08suvrnavu:2117: yo 'sau karṇaḥ sārthavāho 'yam evāsau divākaraḥ sārthavāhas tena kālena tena samayena yā sā karṇasya sārthavāhasya bhāryā /
T08suvrnavu:2119: dāsī kāśisundarī dāsaḥ pracaṇḍo 'grāmātyas tena kālena tena samayena /
T08suvrnavu:2121: [116] punar api rājā 'jātaśatruḥ sthavirānandam idam avocat /
T08suvrnavu:2122: kiṃ bhadantānanda suvarṇavarṇena bhikṣuṇā karma kṛtaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:2123: yasya karmaṇo vipākenādūśy anapakārī śūle samāropitaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:2126: bhūtapūrvaṃ mahārājātīte dhvani candro nāma samyaksambuddho loka udapādi tathāgato
T08suvrnavu:2127: 'rhan samyaksambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ
T08suvrnavu:2128: śāstā devānāñ ca manuṣyānāñ ca buddho bhagavān asau 'nyatamāṃ rājadhānīm upaniḥsṛtya viharati sma /
T08suvrnavu:2129: tena khalu samayenānyatamasmiṃś ca vihāre 'nyatamo bhikṣuḥ dhārmakathikaḥ sa kālena kālam āgatāgatānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati
T08suvrnavu:2132: [117] yāvad apareṇa samayenājito nāma bhikṣuḥ dhārmakathiko yuktamuktapratibhānaś citrakatho madhurakatho /
T08suvrnavu:2133: janapadacārikāñ caran taṃ vihāram āgataḥ sa catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ dharma deśayaty ādau
T08suvrnavu:2134: kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavaśāne kalyāṇaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ
T08suvrnavu:2138: tasya naivāsikasya dhārmakathikasya bhikṣor lābhasatkārasamucchinnas tasyaitad abhavad ajitena me bhikṣuṇā lābhasatkāra samucchedaḥ kṛtaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:2139: tad yāvad eṣa ihāvatiṣṭhate tāvat kuto me lābhasatkāro bhaviṣyati /
T08suvrnavu:2143: asatkāro 'sya prayoktavya iti viditvānyatamāṃ brāhmaṇakumārikām āha /
T08suvrnavu:2144: bhaginy ahan te vāsoyugam anupradāsyāmy etam ajitaṃ bhikṣuṃ dūṣaya mayā sārddham abrahmacārīti /
T08suvrnavu:2145: sā kathayaty ārya yady aham evaṃ vakṣyāmi tat ko māṃ pariṇeṣyati /
T08suvrnavu:2147: sa kathayaty ahaṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yathā na mahājanaviditaṃ bhaviṣyati /
T08suvrnavu:2149: api tu yadāyaṃ tṛbhiś caturbhiḥ parair bhikṣubhiḥ sārddhaṃ niṣaṇṇa ihāvatiṣṭhate /
T08suvrnavu:2152: [118] yāvad aparasmin divase sa dhārmakathiko bhikṣur bhikṣubhiḥ sārddhaṃ layanadvāre niṣaṇṇaḥ kathāsāṃkathyenāvatiṣṭhate tayā ca brāhmaṇadārikayā gatvābhihitaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:2153: ārya pravrajitā yūyam iti kṛtvā vayam iha visrabdhā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ manyāmahe /
T08suvrnavu:2154: tat katham etad yuktaṃ yad aham anenāpy ajitena bhikṣuṇā haṭhād gṛhītvā vikumārī kṛteti /
T08suvrnavu:2156: bhagini maivam vada naitac chrotavyam iti /
T08suvrnavu:2157: tatas tena dhārmakathikena bhikṣuṇā na sādhu kṛtaṃ na sādhu kṛtam ity uktvā ajitasya bhikṣor avarṇo niścāritaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:2158: yāvac chravaṇaparaṃparayā 'jitena bhikṣuṇā śrutaṃ śrutvā kathayati /
T08suvrnavu:2163: bhadanta kim mayā tavāparādhaṃ kṛtaṃ yad evam avarṇaniścāraṇaṃ me kṛtavān asīti /
T08suvrnavu:2164: tena tasyāntike cittaṃ pradūṣya kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritaṃ tādṛśaṃ tvayā pāpakarma kṛtaṃ yena tvaṃ śulam arhasīti /
T08suvrnavu:2165: tac chrutvā ajitasya bhikṣor etad abhavat /
T08suvrnavu:2166: duḥkhito 'yaṃ tapasvy upahataś ceti viditvā pātracīvaram ādāya yathāparibhuktaṃ śayanāsanaṃ pratiśamāyya tasmād vihārān niṣkramya saṃprasthitaḥ
T08suvrnavu:2167: tañ ca saṃprasthitam avalokya bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇyaḥ sa ca karvaṭakanīvāsījanakāyas taṃ nivarttayitukāmāḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubaddhā //
T08suvrnavu:2169: [119] tasya dhārmakathikasya bhikṣoḥ kaukṛtyam utpannaṃ na śobhanaṃ mayā kṛtaṃ yal
T08suvrnavu:2170: lābhasatkārakāraṇād īdṛśam apāyagatisamvartanīyaṃ karma kṛtam ity utpannavaimanasyo
T08suvrnavu:2171: gacchāmy enaṃ kṣamāpayāmīti tvaritatvaritaṃ tasmād vihārān niṣkramyātisamvignamanā
T08suvrnavu:2172: aśrudhārāvasicyamānadīnavadano bāladāraka ivoccaiḥ prarudaran paśyatā teṣām anekeṣāṃ
T08suvrnavu:2173: brāhmaṇagṛhapatiśatasahasrāṇām ajitasya bhikṣoḥ pādayor nipatyātyayam atyayato deśayitum ārabdhaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:2174: kṣamasva bhadanta yathā bālena yathā mūḍhena yathāvyaktenākuśalena lābhasatkārābhibhūtena mayā tavābhūtenāvarṇo niścāritas tad atyayam atyato deśayata kṣamasvānukampām upādayeti /
T08suvrnavu:2176: āyuṣmān kṣāntam ity uktvātīvasaṃvignacitto 'nyatamaṃ vṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya niṣaṇṇaḥ
T08suvrnavu:2177: paryaṅkam ābhujya ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtim upasthāpya tena tasminn
T08suvrnavu:2178: eva paramasamvegadravīkṛtacetasā udyacchatā ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva
T08suvrnavu:2179: pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā yāvat sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo
T08suvrnavu:2181: sa vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājo gaganatalam utpatya tasya mahato janakāyasya manāṃsy abhiprasādyan vividhāni prātihāryāṇi pradarśayitum ārabdhaḥ
T08suvrnavu:2182: sa ca dhārmakathiko bhikṣus taṃ gaganatalas tam avalokya hā kasṭam īdṛśasya mayā maharṣer antike cittaṃ pradūṣitam ity uktvā mūrchitaḥ pṛthivyāṃ nipatitaḥ //
T08suvrnavu:2184: [120] atrāntare bhagavāṃś candraḥ samyaksambuddho mahākaruṇayā parigatahṛdayaḥ mā
T08suvrnavu:2185: khalv ayaṃ dhārmakathiko bhikṣur uṣṇaṃ śoṇitaṃ chardayitvā kālaṃ kariṣyatīti viditvā
T08suvrnavu:2187: tato bhagavatā candreṇa samyaksambuddhena cakrasvastikanandyāvartajālāvavaddhenānekapuṇyaśatanirjātena bhītānām āśvāsanakareṇa kareṇa sa dhārmakathiko bhikṣuḥ śirasi parāmṛṣṭaḥ /
T08suvrnavu:2188: spṛṣṭamātraś ca bhagavatā sa bhikṣuś cetanāṃ pratilabhyotthito 'tyayam atyayato deśayitum ārabdhāḥ //
T08suvrnavu:2189: atha bhagavāṃś candraḥ samyaksambuddhas tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthā bhāṣate /
T08suvrnavu:2190: puruṣasya hi jātasya kuṭhārī jāyate mukhe /
T08suvrnavu:2191: cchinnatti hi yayātmānaṃ vācā durbhāṣitaṃ vadan /1/
T08suvrnavu:2192: yo nindyajanaṃ praśaṃsati praśaṃsyañ ca janaṃ vinindati /
T08suvrnavu:2193: sa cinoti mukhena taṃ kaliṃ kalīnāṃ yena sukhaṃ na vandati /2/
T08suvrnavu:2194: alpamātro hy ayaṃ kalir ya ihākṣaiḥ svadhanaṃ parājayet /
T08suvrnavu:2195: ayam atra mahattaraḥ kalir yaḥ sugateṣu manaḥ pradūṣayet /3/
T08suvrnavu:2196: śataṃ sahasrāṇi nirarbudānāṃ ṣaṭtriṅśataṃ pañca caivārbudāni /
T08suvrnavu:2197: yān āryagarhī narakān upaiti vācaṃ manaś ca praṇidhāya pāpakaṃ /4/
T08suvrnavu:2198: ( for a verse in Tibetan corresponding to Udānavarga VIII.6)
T08suvrnavu:2201: ity eṣa bhagavāṃś candra samyaksambuddhastāṃ parṣadaṃ dhārmayā kathayā yāvat saṃpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ //
T08suvrnavu:2203: [121] kim manyase mahārājānyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena dhārmakathiko bhikṣur abhūd iti /

T08suvrnavu:2205: bhikṣor antike citta pradūṣya kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena pañcajanmaśatāni
T08suvrnavu:2206: narakeṣu pattvā manuṣyeṣu cotpannaḥ pañcajātiśatāni adūṣy anapakārī śūlam āropito
T08suvrnavu:2207: yāvad etarhy api tenaiva karmavaśeṇādūṣy anapakārī śūlam ārāpito yady anena tat karma
T08suvrnavu:2208: kṛtvā nātyayam atyayato deśitaṃ syāt tad eṣa pañcajanmaśatāny ekaikasmiṃ mahāniraye pakvaḥ syāt /
T08suvrnavu:2210: yad anena bhagavataś candrasya samyaksambuddhasya śāsane brahmacaryañ caritaṃ tasya
T08suvrnavu:2211: karmaṇo vipākenaitarhy anena bhagavacchāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam iti //
T08suvrnavu:2212: tasmāt tarhi mahārāja ātmano duḥkham anvicchatā na pareṣām antike cittapradūṣaṇaṃ kartavyaṃ //
T08suvrnavu:2214: ātmanaḥ sukham anvicchatā pareṣām api sukhopasaṃhāraḥ kartavya ity athāsmin dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe 'nekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasrair mahāṃ viśeṣo 'dhigataḥ /
T08suvrnavu:2215: kaiścit śrotāpattiphalaṃ kaiścit sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ kaiścid anāgāmiphalaṃ kaiścit pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ /
T08suvrnavu:2219: yadbhūyasā sā parṣad buddhanimnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyasthāpitā //
T08suvrnavu:2221: [122] atha divākaraḥ sārthavāha ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya kṛtakarapuṭaḥ sthavirānandam etad avocat
T08suvrnavu:2222: āryānanda mayā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho 'ntarggṛhe upanimantrya ṣaḍrasenāhāreṇa
T08suvrnavu:2223: bhojayitvā ekaiko bhikṣuḥ śatasahasrakeṇa cīvareṇācchādayitavya iti vicintitaṃ sa
T08suvrnavu:2224: ca bhagavān parinirvṛtas tad icchāmy āyīnandapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgham adhunā bhojayitum iti //
T08suvrnavu:2226: sārthavāhaivaṃ kuruṣvāhaṃ tathā kariṣyāmi sarva eva jāmbūdvīpāvasthitā bhagavataḥ śrāvakā ihāgamiṣyantīti /
T08suvrnavu:2227: atha divākaraḥ sārthavāhaḥ praharṣapūrṇamanā rājagṛhasya nagarasya bahir maṇḍalavāṭakam
T08suvrnavu:2230: atiramaṇīyaṃ kārayitvā tām eva rātriṃ śucipraṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ samudānīya kālyam evotthāyāsanaprajñaptiṃ
T08suvrnavu:2231: kṛtvodakamaṇī pratiṣṭhāpya sthavirānandasya dūtena kālam ārocayati /
T08suvrnavu:2232: samayo bhadanta sajjaṃ bhaktaṃ yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase / ity
T08suvrnavu:2234: [123] atha sthavirānando nabhastalam utplutya ṛddhyā sakalam idaṃ jambudvīpam vilīnakanaka_vabhāsayā
T08suvrnavu:2235: prabhayāvabhāsya svayam eva gaṇḍīm ākoṭya sajalajaladharagambhīraodāttena svareṇodghoṣitavān
T08suvrnavu:2236: ye bhagavataḥ śrāvakā ṛddher lābhinas te svakīyayā ṛddhyā āgacchantu ye pṛthagjanās
T08suvrnavu:2240: ca ye bhikṣavaḥ samādhisamāpattisukhalābhinnaḥ prativasanti tatkṣaṇaāt sarvam idaṃ
T08suvrnavu:2241: nabhastalamaśokakiṃśusadṛśaiḥ sandhyālohitair iva jīmūtavṛndair ācchādayanto rājagṛhanagaram
T08suvrnavu:2246: tṛtīyā pṛthakagjanakalyāṇakānāṃ tato yathā vṛddhikayā prajñapteṣu sveṣu sveṣv āśaneṣūpaviṣṭāḥ //
T08suvrnavu:2248: [124] atha divākara sārthavāhaḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇam āryasthavirānandapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ santarpayati /
T08suvrnavu:2249: yāvad bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhuktavadantaṃ viditvā dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ śatasahasreṇa tricīvareṇācchādayitukāmas taṃ bhikṣusaṃgham avalokya prītimanā abhavat /
T08suvrnavu:2250: suvarṇavarṇaś ca tasyāśayam avagamyāha alpotsuka tvaṃ bhava hi /
T08suvrnavu:2252: tataḥ suvarṇavarṇena bhikṣuṇā tasminn eva kṣaṇe svaśarīrāt suvarṇapītāni vasrāṇi
T08suvrnavu:2253: avatāryāvatārya śatasahasramūlyānāṃ yathā vṛddhikayā tisṛṇāṃ bhikṣukoṭīnāṃ tricīvaram anupradattaṃ //

T08suvrnavu:2257: sāntaḥpurakumārāmatyapaurajānapadasahāyas taṃ tathāvidham āścaryam avalokya vismayotphullalocanas
T08suvrnavu:2258: trir udānam udānayaty aho puṇyaphalavipākaḥ aho puṇyānāṃ sāmarthya aho dakṣiṇīyakṣetrāvaropitasya

T08suvrnavu:2263: [125] tato divākaraḥ sārthavāha uthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
